text: I love coming to the city cafe diner. They have the best food in Huntsville. The staff are very welcoming and they always greet you with a smile. The facility is very clean and family friendly.

name: Alicia G
text: If you're wondering if they're practicing any safety measures to reduce the risk of spreading covid, they're absolutely not. The hostess is basically useless.

name: Tylan Schneider
text: Service is always good and ridiculously huge sized portions

name: Tec Support
text: City Cafe... Where you go if you want to be rolled out the door with a food coma.  Service was great as always, the food was excellent as always.  The only complaint one might ever have is trying to figure out what you want from the ginormous menu.

name: ll72hima
text: Great food and service.

name: D Roger
text: Good service and food.

name: Sonja Redwine
text: Wonderful great food&service!!

name: Kaska Howard
text: Food we got was OK, kids enjoyed their chocolate chip pancakes. Cakes are awesome! They taste as good as they look!

name: Ringo Still
text: Best cafe in Huntsville al we stop in when we go to Huntsville great food and prices

name: Pam Norris
text: I love this diner. I frequently come, while visiting my daughter.

name: McNerdy Axolotls and Adventures
text: Woah- tried this plce for the first time and t was lik. CHICAGO GREEK DINER- such a great meal- dame price as Cracker barrel

name: Alarm Sounding
text: Great customer service.

name: Goreanlady
text: Food and service...Great

name: LoriL Washington
text: Fast & friendly service.

name: Jesse Kennamer
text: Eat your meal here and get dessert to go for later. Maybe find someone to share thre dessert with. It's more than a to go plate can hold.

name: Charles Chen
text: Little known gem that is 24hrs. All around great comfort food and breakfast choices.

name: Deonna Walker
text: Disgusting and food is bland. My food was horrible 😫

name: Okami Seele
text: They always give big portions so you never walk away hungry. I personally love their sea food soup, I wish they had it more often though! 10/10

name: Kaitlyn Seagle
text: Service was wonderful and it was very well kept and clean. You definitely won't leave hungry, but the food is just ok. The chocolate suicide cake was great and the majority of it is sitting in the fridge waiting for my return!

name: Debra Carter
text: Very good restaurant with great food and large portions. Something for everyone with Italian and Greek faves and other comfort faves and seafood as well. We were all very full and happy with our selections. This was first time we went out for Christmas and even though they were busy they got us in as soon as they could. We eat here several times a year and will definitely return. Also try one of their specialty cakes it is well worth it and 1 piece is enough for 2 or 3 people.

name: C.J.
text: I always order the Liver & Onions.  Very tender, juicy & delicious. Thank you, Chef!

name: Amanda Taylor
text: Very good food and friendly staff!!

name: Jack Gill
text: Great food. Wide variety of meals. Try the chicken wings or Godfather chicken. Greek food served here too.

name: Mandii S
text: Good food nice staff

name: Rick Sellers
text: Terrible, service was trash and the food, completely dissatisfied

name: tyra murry
text: MARTHA IS THE BEST!!!! She was sweet, efficient, and the food was delicious.

name: Seth & Sharon Henry
text: I had the classic diner fare of a burger and fries. The burger was outstanding, and the fries were good. My only issue is that the restaurant was out of sliced cheddar and melted some shredded cheddar on the bun instead instead of the patty. It tasted fine, but the texture wasn't what I am used to. Despite that, the burger was very juicy and cooked to order.

name: T Quinones
text: First time here but I think lunch and dinner may be alot better than breakfast. Wouldn't suggest having the pancakes but the waffles are great.

name: Noah Gill
text: Great meals and will make your order special any way you want. The desert selection is my favorite! OMG 😲 cake, pie,  cheese cake.

name: alaa awni
text: Stuff is nice and kind , but the food is food is not that much,,never saw cold burger meat

name: Jacinta Reed
text: For me this was a hidden treasure. The staff was very polite and attentive. They serve both breakfast and dinner. The menu has soooooo many choices to choose from for whatever your cravings maybe. You will not go wrong with stopping here.

name: Russ Donaldson
text: Large portions and very quick service.

name: J Allen
text: Food came out super fast! An it was not that bad! I would come back for sure

name: Gary Moore
text: We were quickly seated even though they were busy. I had chicken and waffle. The waffle was delicious - golden brown, light and fluffy! The chicken tenders were good, but I've had better. My wife had bacon, scrambled eggs, grits and a waffle. She said it was all very good as was the coffee.

name: Mayra Pangborn
text: Loved this place..good servers provided fast service and excellent food.

name: Carl
text: Large menu, always delicious & fresh. The homemade desserts are unbelievable

name: danny newton
text: Always huge portions and everything is good.

name: Renee Alequin
text: Went here for breakfast,  it was so good we went back for dinner!  Friendly staff and great food!

name: Ishma'il Abdul Haq Allgood
text: In town from Winchester Tennessee and we just left from there. Wow. Customer service was great. Food was good, and the bathrooms were clean. My brother and I will be back (God willing).

name: Keith Robinson
text: Very friendly service. Menu has plenty of variety. Sometimes you may not like a dish but that doesn't mean it isn't quality.

name: Robin McBay
text: Service very friendly and prompt and their Greek food is simply amazing

name: Christine Brunker-Jennings
text: This place is amazing!!!!!! They have just about anything you want and it is always good... and dessert Holy Cow HUGE!!! The Turtle Cheesecake is to die for!!!!

name: Trent Clark
text: Just a great place to eat. I love the dinner feel and service is second to none.

name: PATRICIA MENDEZ
text: Yes and yes and yes! I love this place!! Everything I ordered was always delicious! The breakfast pancakes, eggs potatoes dang it even the toast is good.  I appreciate the generous portions as I do enjoy a good meal. Everything is always flavorful and cooked to perfection. Even on busy days the wait wasn’t ever too long. I recommend pretty much everything. I never tried their 2 ft tall (exaggerating a wee bit) cakes only because I was always too full for dessert. The cakes look delicious. If you’re ever on South Parkway and Drake stop by for some down home mouth watering good eats! Bon Appetite!

name: lady Lacy
text: Excellent food and service

name: Brenda Hicks
text: Great place to eat.

name: Elizabeth Corfield
text: The food appears tasty, but was incredibly dry and flavorless.  The only redeeming factors for me were the service and toast.... I don't understand the great reviews.

name: Melanie Ogle
text: Chopped steak is off the chain

name: Steven Vest
text: Great food,  great service,  and huge portions.  You won't leave hungry and Desserts are awsome.

name: MelindaLeigh65
text: Felt like home!  Well, like I was at one of our favorite places at home anyway. Reasonable prices, good food, nice and clean!

name: Bridgett Bohanon
text: This place is amazing!! Lots of food choices, large portions and service was excellent! Chili burger is a must!!! And dessert.....oh my!! So many to choose from and all amazing!!

name: Kwende Madu
text: Tasty hearty portions!

name: Mildred Lofton
text:
Excellent experience each time we visit.
We have made them our place to go for over 4 years.

name: Christopher
text: Amazing food and amazing service!! They are observing all COVID precautions very well!

name: Emily Hsi
text:
It wasnt as good as ihop breakfast. Patty melt was good. My friend got a chicken pot pie that was HUGE. Plenty of dinner rolls to start. The menu is extensive, the restaurant can accommodate large party of 20, servings are large.
The display of gorgeous cakes , that are made elsewhere for city cafe diners , look so tempting . But i was full from my meal.

name: Mick Brannan
text: I had the chicken parmesan and as always, it was amazing. The portions at this place are always too much to finish. I took as much home as I had eaten. Literally 2 meals for the price of one. The service was so fast I barely finished my salad before the entree arrived. My tea glass never goes empty there and I'm never disappointed. The restaurant has a very wide variety of menu items from American, Italian, Greek and more. The desserts are homemade and the portions on them are always enough to share unless you eat it all because it's delicious. You have gotta try this place. You won't be disappointed.

name: Brandy Olander
text: Very good food and quick service

name: Paulina Castaneda
text:
This is my second time eating here. I just left with my oldest daughter. I had a taste for waffles, so she took me to Huntsville.
I had a waffle with 2 scramble eggs and two sausages with coffee and she had French toast with scramble eggs and coffee. The price was reasonable. The diner was clean and staff was friendly.

name: Brandon Word
text: The food was excellent!! They have just about anything you could want!!

name: David Childers
text: Great as always! My go to place in Huntsville

name: Coretta Johnson
text: The chicken tenders were great! Fries were hot and fresh as well. The only issue I had was the coleslaw. It had a really great taste to it, but it was a little "soupy." The carrot cake was delicious!

name: Ric n Bonnie Knox
text: Great food, service and value. And the desserts are unbelievable!

name: Brandon Buckman
text: Portions huge ,quality great ,service  fantastic, deserts undescribably amazing can't wait to go back

name: Angelique Hughley
text: Awesome service. Great food. When you walk into the building you're instantly swarming towards the case of desserts. There is a variety of foods to choose from for all to enjoy. Open late.

name: mitchell black
text: Food was good and people there were friendly! I didn't see their food grade, and therefore I was unable to tell you about that. I like gor eating establishments to be proud enough of their grade to prominently display!!!

name: Dean Cooper
text: We have always had good service and great food there. Large portions too.

name: Cliff Mead
text: One of my favorite local spots for dining with friends and family.  Wide range of menu choices so definitely something for everyone.  Great atmosphere and great service! Never disappointed!

name: Chester Butler
text: Second visit better than the first visit..great service and food..

name: Mary Ingram
text: Delicious Greek omelette with gyro meat

name: Glitter Glitter
text: Great food Great Service big portions

name: Colleen Harding
text: City Cafe has a huge selection of food, and everything is always done perfect!  I love this place.

name: Teresa Thrower
text: The food was delicious and the service was good.

name: Blake Barnwell
text: I come here maybe once a year. It is always delightful, never had a terrible plate here. Definitely gourmet food! Look forward to coming again!

name: Mike Chandler
text: The food is really good and will fill you up for the rest of the day, They also like to temp you with their cake display.

name: Eugene Griffin
text: Great service, they kept us occupied with free appetizers. Portions were enormous! Food was cooked great! Atmosphere was calm and serene. On my radar for frequent visits!

name: jane h.
text: Sunday brunch/lunch crowd was my first time visiting City Cafe. It was only a 5-10 minute wait for our table and we were served promptly by friendly staff. I just have to comment that their entire staff in that restaurant, as I observed them, were a well-oiled machine. I ordered from a breakfast menu and the food was very good. Several of my friends who have eaten at City Cafe have said that anything on their menu is excellent. I would recommend them.

name: Meloney Barnard
text: Food and service were fantastic! My only complaint was that I didn't save room for dessert,  it all looked so delicious!

name: Tim Williams
text: Great food and service...The folks are real friendly

name: Brandi Beech
text: If you decide to go ask for Rick, he is great and  very friendly. Food was bland and didn't have any taste. The kitchen mixed our dishes, half my items were on my friends plate and vice versa. Lunch and dinner maybe better but avoid breakfast.

name: Joshua Holdiman
text: This picture explains more than any words I could use. If you haven't already been here, stop what you are doing and go now.

name: Queen of Dixie
text: Ive been here 5 times now and each time i have had simply wonderful food and grate customer service! And i cant say enough about the cakes, absolutely brilliant. Worth every penny.

name: Thomas Loewen
text:
Got the Athens combo Shared with my girlfriend it was fantastic and we both left stuffed!
Service was excellent also!

name: Russell Litterell
text: Excellent breakfast!  Visiting from Memphis and dropped in on our way home. Amy our server was terrific!

name: Sandra Yokem
text: Best food and service ❤

name: Christine K
text: So so good. Gyro was amazing..

name: Jennifer Bradley
text: All the reviews that say there's an abundance of food, are correct. I had the spanakopita and it came with a salad or soup and rice and a broiled potato. It was so much food for $10. And the huge slice of cake for under $8. Everything was so good if only I could eat it all. It really is an extensive menu but not so much that I could decided what to eat. Will definitely go again if I'm ever back in Huntsville.

name: Michael Farnsworth
text: the food was good to service was great

name: Willie Faulks
text: My wife's hash browns where horrible and the food is not that good 😕

name: EB Speakman
text: Don't get scared by the price on the menu. You get a lot of food. Most of the time I cant finish my plate so I yake it home for lunch the next day. They do have some daily specials that are good. Believe me You will find something you will like here.

name: Nicholas Perone
text:
This place has typically been good for their variety of foods and service..
Unfortunately, Today was a deal breaker...
I ordered The Godfather Chicken which i have on several different occasions, with little to no reason to complain.. Today was simply something that was unacceptable, at least to myself and the waitress, but the manager however, simply looked for an excuse instead of addressing the issue with the chef..
I do not care where you go to eat, there are people in society that have “Food Allergies”, therefore, you should always protect against “Cross Contamination” due to Allergies and protect against a health risk or death due to the allergies.. If you have something in your dish that you are serving, Those ingredients should be listed on the menu to protect the customers.. Today I found Broccoli in my Godfathers Chicken.. Not just 1 piece, but 2, and was simply told by the management, NOT that she would address the issue, but that the vegetables are all together and “UNLESS I SPECIFY THAT IM ALLERGIC”, then basically, I assume the risk, even though all the other ingredients are listed on the menu!!!!!
Something must be done to protect the customers in the food industry and not just blown off..
And YES, I have pics and will retain the receipt for this meal, in case any of the UPPER management would like to reach out..

name: Mother Legacy
text:
Delicious. Large portions
Kind staff
Low cost!
Loved it

name: Stuart
text: Service slow. Took orders all around us from 1st from people who sat way after us. Food was just ok.

name: Douglas Downing
text: We went when it was busy, so I figure that plays into it. The place isnt bad. The food came out pretty quick and was pretty good for how packed the place was. Will have to go again. The cakes and pies are awesome.

name: Judy Morgida
text: The City Cafe is always great!  You get seated right away, prompt service and consistently delicious food.  When I'm in the area I always go to the City Cafe.  They have all the elements you look for in a great restaurant.  I have never had a bad meal there.

name: Linda Huggins
text: Our family celebrated my birthday at City Cafe Diner tonight.  The service was excellent,  and the food was absolutely delicious.  I throughly enjoyed the fried eggplant.  The birthday carrot cake was the perfect ending to the meal.We are all frequent customers there and agree that we have never been disappointed.  We agree that City Cafe is our favorite restaurant . We will return,  again and again.

name: Kathy Brisbee
text: The service was bad but mostly the food had no flavor.i go to city cafe in chattanooga and its great but the one in huntsville need a lot of changes

name: Sheila Burchette
text: Awesome food and massive pieces of cake.

name: Jolene Dean
text: I am not a huge fan of this place, but my boyfriend loves their Greek food.  The last time we went, I ordered an omelet, and found 3 huge chunks of egg shell in it.  They didn't charge me for it, thankfully.. but it was still upsetting. Same trip, my cousin ordered the shepherds pie, and the meat inside was pink..so he also had to send his back and order something else.  Hopefully this was a fluke, and they fired that cook!  Bottom line.. they have a huge menu with a big variety of food, so there is something for everyone.. but I have not enjoyed any of the American (or Italian) foods on their menu, other than the country fried steak.  Go if you like Greek! And they have an impressive selection of desserts.. expensive slices of cake..but enough to share with 2 or 3 people.

name: Dawn Cangelosi
text: Great people, wonderful service.  Food is always great.  They have Aron of options and it is always a joy!

name: Ker Talbot
text: Lunch was delicious and the service was excellent. The Mac and cheese, mmmm! The scalloped potatoes were awesome, also. The chicken and dumplings were good. My momma made them differently, so they weren't my favorite. I wish they made hot rolls. Otherwise, fantastic!!

name: Larry
text: Huge portions, really friendly wait staff. Nice family atmosphere.

name: Lori L Washington
text: Amy is the BEST waitress, hands down!

name: Zack Shields
text: The service was friendly, but the food tasted very low-quality.  I started with the seafood bisque, and it tasted so fishy that I downed a glass of Sprite after one spoonful just to get the taste out of my mouth.  I then got my turkey dinner.  The turkey was alright, but I think the mashed potatoes were boxed because they were not pleasant to eat.  At $15 for that meal, I could have cooked at least 5 meals at home of much better quality.

name: Daniel Lucas
text: Awesome food, nice diner atmosphere, and friendly staff.  I most definitely will eat here often.

name: James Goeller
text: Always good food

name: Darlene Hanson
text: Need to have individual items prices individually only reason we cane is because the wait was too long at cracker barrel

name: C. White
text: Extensive menu and great service!

name: Amanda Martin
text: Great place to eat best cake oh my yes.

name: Dan Burke
text: Very good! Clean sanitized facility! Super fast service with excellent food.

name: Jimi Thing
text:
Good food good prices plenty of food
Try the seafood bisque

name: Ed Waddington
text: The service is great. The food is abundant and tasty. The cost is very reasonable and the desserts are delicious and large. We try to visit this place as often as we can because the quality and quantity is always consistent with what we expect. Try it and you will come back for more as well.

name: Lea Ann Nolen
text: We went for Thanksgiving and had a less than positive experience.  First, we had a group of 10 so my 90 year dad got there early to get a table.  He asked our waitress to check with the hostess to see if any of the rest of the party had arrived.  She told him no that he'd have to go do it.  My dad has a hard time getting up and down.  It was ridiculous that she couldn't check for him.  The rest of us were seated on the opposite side of the restaurant.  From there, service just got worse.  Very disappointing.  Just an FYI, the sweet potato casserole is not casserole but seemed to be canned jams or something.  Definitely not traditional sweet potato casserole.

name: Allen Johns
text: What a great place. It feels like a throwback that is much loved and much appreciated. Great food, courteous staff. I love the gyro!

name: Lindsey B
text: I went to City Cafe for the first time after my CMA graduation and I was very impressed. You get so much food for your money and the staff is incredibly attentive and kind. The food also tasted amazing!

name: Alan H
text: Excellent food and service

name: Holly Hinkle
text: Just trying to provide feedback on blts... Bacon needs to be crispier and two other slices added, another tomato slice for a fantastic blt!  And inspect the lettuce better. People will pay for a great sandwich!

name: Carl Noble
text: We were in Huntsville for a ham radio fest. We ate 4 times here at your Diner. I can’t describe how wonderful your food is - and huge portions and low cost. We will return next year for sure. Carl and Elizabeth Noble. Oh your waitress’s were fabulous !

name: Destry Webster
text: Food was excellent and the dessert looked amazing.

name: Mark Tenney
text: I have never had a bad dish here and the service is always good too. I brought a friend out to this place that had never eaten here and he loved it as well. This trip I had a gyro and tater salad and it was delicious. The portions are so large it's hard to save room for dessert. And let me tell you this you need to do that, there cakes are amazing!

name: Howard Wirts
text: Was profiled upon  entering because of a helmet and leather jacket. The person at desk motioned the people that entered after to get their name on the book. Food was good but front end service I was not happy with. Waitress was good especially as full as restaurant was.

name: M S
text: Good food and our server was great.  We'll be visiting again.

name: Angela Yancy
text: Great place to eat no matter what you are hungry for. Fast, hot food, and made to order. Plus their dessert cases are out of this world! There is not another place like this in Huntsville and we drive over an hour to eat there.

name: Brian Patsos
text: Great Greek food...they have Greek Lemon Potatoes

name: Warren Winkler
text: Their Chef Salads are made the way they should be done. Ham, Turkey, and Roast Beef. Their Blue Cheese and Ranch dressings are awesome.

name: arosemorose
text: We had just regular breakfast food, eggs and hash rows and biscuits and things. All were extremely dry and without flavor, even the biscuit. We tried covering everything in ketchup which didn't help much. We'll stick to IHOP. staff were all friendly though!

name: Betty Deckert
text:
I enjoyed my meal at City Cafe last night. I had two eggs toes deli ham and french fries gloves iced tea to drink and vanilla ice cream with syrup for dessert.
I'm a veteran so I can get 10% discount on my meal even when I bring a friend with me.

name: Dena Ridenhour
text: Great service and the food was amazing!!

name: Francis Colvais
text: Excellent service all following covid protocols

name: Carmen Edwards
text: Great food! Service with a smile! ALWAYS a pleasure.  Thank you!

name: Sue
text: Good food at reasonable prices.  Service was good, too.

name: Stephanie Hopkins
text: Great food

name: Laura Bolton
text: The best

name: Barry Fitzgerald
text: The best food and service! Our server was the best and my Tour of Italy was better than I have ever had... anywhere!

name: Shannon aka Naenae
text: Fresh food, amazing service and conveniently located with a large menu of variety such as soups, salads, seafood, wraps, sandwiches and more

name: professional _ idiot
text: It was so delicious! The food is very well cooked, and there's lots of it. The diner has a very good atmosphere, and they are never understaffed. Also, WARNING the desserts are HUGE.  You could literally split a slice of cake between 5 people and have some left over. I am not kidding. Really good. Love this place, would recommend.

name: Kay Ohtie
text: Tasty, fast, and relatively cheap! The specials are a great deal for making sure you leave satisfied and full! Gyro was good, and their pasticcio was delicious, topped with the requisite "Greek gravy", even complete with the little bit of essential nutmeg. Would definitely come back to try more!

name: MaryBeth Martin
text: First off i would like to thank all the staff for working on xmas!. Had a wonderful dinner with many options. Taylor was our server and she was so sweet and took great care of us.

name: Pam Burrows
text:
I enjoy the city cafe diner and eat there often. I ordered breakfast and the food was really good. The server was pleasant and professional. The prices are fair because  you get plenty of food.
I recommend this place to everyone.

name: Wayne Suchman
text: Awesome food good service friendly people

name: Yvan Mullinix
text: The assortment of giant desserts is decadent.

name: Rocking Robin
text: Great food and nice people. We had breakfast sandwich, pancakes, and bacon.

name: Mary Ann Grear
text:
Amazing  Genuine Greek Diner!
Service is fast, food is excellent! Expect a short wait for breakfast on the weekends.

name: Cathy Clayton
text: Lots of good. You will not leave hungry

name: xavier eze
text: Me and my wife went at 1am and the staff was excellent from the time we walked in, til the time we left..everything was hot and fresh and the food was brought out in a timely manner..its been a while since I've received this type of service, it was a great experience. I would definitely recommend trying this place

name: Becca Burgess
text: Food & service are fabulous! Key Lime Cheesecake looks divine. I eat here every time I'm in Huntsville, they never disappoint.

name: Janice Garland
text: Absolutely perfect lunch! Tasty, hot and fresh! Our server was outstanding as well.  Have eaten at City Cafe Diner, several times. Always, right on que with good food and customer service.

name: Morgann Peters
text: Portions are awesome. Prices are a little high, but the friendly service, expansive menu, and truly quality food make up for that. They have anything your hungry heart could desire, from great Greek food (though I'd skip the soups next time; they're bland and gummy) to excellent home cooked American fare. Their hamburger steak is savory excellence; their chicken piccata is JUST like my favourite recipe; their fries are just right, and their gyros are hugely satisfying. And we took ours to go. We'll probably go again soon.

name: Don Williams
text:
City Cafe Diner is AWESOME. Best meal we have had out and about in a long time. Service was top notch. Friendly atmosphere and great food, you can't get better than that. Food comes to the table so hot you swear they are cooking it at the next booth. Wife got the shrimp and spinach stuffed chicken with noodles and it was piping hot and every bite had shrimp in it. I had a Greek type meal and you would swear you were in Greece getting the meal. It was amazing. The amount of food for the price is outstanding. Extra large portions for a very small price. Deserts are amazing also. Many choices, from cheese cake, all different flavored cakes to pies. And the portions of cake you get is like you get almost a quarter of the cake.
OUTSTANDING place, a CAN'T MISS Restaurant.

name: Julie Pitts
text: I loved the atmosphere here immediately upon arriving. They welcome you in and are seated (even with a small wait) rather quickly. The menu is very diverse having American, Greek and Italian meals. Our drinks quickly came and being new we went with the American menu items. We were going to start with an appetizer and when it came it was large enough for four adults.  Portions are mega portions at this diner. My husband got a cheeseburger the size of a grapefruit! He was very happy with the taste. I had a western omelette and it was huge. However after reading the menu a second time if you like cheese with that you will have to order it. Since this restaurant also had Greek and Italian dishes I automatically thought there would be many seasonings to our food. However the appetizer which included fries, chicken fingers, and onion rings we're very bland in taste. That is the only issue I found with this restaurant. Maybe they too were made to order and being in a hurry we missed it on the menu (like no cheese for my omelet). I would highly recommend going to the City Cafe. The price to portion ratio makes it worth it. Oh, by the way, when walking into this diner there are cake boxes that hold immense cakes of many flavors! It is an awesome display. You cannot lose even if you just come in for cake and coffee! Don't let this jewel slip by you

name: Wendy S
text: Food was sooo good!!!

name: Lowndes Whatley
text: Wow, what a surprise.  It was really good.  The PL was full of cars, so that was the hint.  The desert case is full of huge cakes, cheesecakes, pies, pastries, etc., and the Greek combo was huge and excellent.  Great service and quick.  I'll be back.

name: Sophia p
text: The food is so good. I love coming here.

name: Jason
text: Excellent food wide variety of options and best service in town

name: Lee Madkin
text: Good soups! Good price!

name: Danny Mullins
text: Great food best in huntsville

name: john richardson
text: They are open on Christmas Day and they have a big  selection for you.

name: Barry Fitzgerald
text: The best food and service! Our server was the best and my Tour of Italy was better than I have ever had... anywhere!

name: Don Williams
text:
City Cafe Diner is AWESOME. Best meal we have had out and about in a long time. Service was top notch. Friendly atmosphere and great food, you can't get better than that. Food comes to the table so hot you swear they are cooking it at the next booth. Wife got the shrimp and spinach stuffed chicken with noodles and it was piping hot and every bite had shrimp in it. I had a Greek type meal and you would swear you were in Greece getting the meal. It was amazing. The amount of food for the price is outstanding. Extra large portions for a very small price. Deserts are amazing also. Many choices, from cheese cake, all different flavored cakes to pies. And the portions of cake you get is like you get almost a quarter of the cake.
OUTSTANDING place, a CAN'T MISS Restaurant.

name: Mendi Watson (MzMeia256)
text: The corned  beef hash and waffles are awesome, and it's my go to dish for breakfast. I had to fight the temptation to take home a slice of cheesecake whenever I was about to leave (chocolate is my favourite). The portions are big for the price, and I haven't had a bad meal since they've been open.

name: Lowndes Whatley
text: Wow, what a surprise.  It was really good.  The PL was full of cars, so that was the hint.  The desert case is full of huge cakes, cheesecakes, pies, pastries, etc., and the Greek combo was huge and excellent.  Great service and quick.  I'll be back.

name: Jason
text: Excellent food wide variety of options and best service in town

name: xavier eze
text: Me and my wife went at 1am and the staff was excellent from the time we walked in, til the time we left..everything was hot and fresh and the food was brought out in a timely manner..its been a while since I've received this type of service, it was a great experience. I would definitely recommend trying this place

name: professional _ idiot
text: It was so delicious! The food is very well cooked, and there's lots of it. The diner has a very good atmosphere, and they are never understaffed. Also, WARNING the desserts are HUGE.  You could literally split a slice of cake between 5 people and have some left over. I am not kidding. Really good. Love this place, would recommend.

name: Yvan Mullinix
text: The assortment of giant desserts is decadent.

name: Tammy Troupe
text: Was amazing! Took my husband there for Father's Day. Not only did we expect a long wait but also assumed the service would be lousy due to the volume of business. We expected this no matter where we went with it being a holiday. It was the complete opposite! We were seated within 10 minutes of arriving and our order was out promptly as well. They were even clearing the tables quickly and preparing them for the next guest! WOW! Thank you for making our special day even more enjoyable. ☺

name: Jackie Flynt
text: Wonderful place to eat.  Service was excellent. The food was delicious I will definitely go back and recommend it to people

name: Jon Lessmann
text: The Greek dishes are amazing.

name: Andrea Clark
text: Fabulous food. Awesome service. Desserts to DIE for. Love this place!

name: Chad Edwards
text: I usually just get the Greek salad but this time I got the gyro and the Greek lasagna... It was great!.... Many many selections on the menu, makes it difficult for deciding what to eat.... But when you do decide, oh it's good! 😆

name: Lisa Kennedy
text: I didn't go I was in the parking lot

name: Tammy Troupe
text: Was amazing! Took my husband there for Father's Day. Not only did we expect a long wait but also assumed the service would be lousy due to the volume of business. We expected this no matter where we went with it being a holiday. It was the complete opposite! We were seated within 10 minutes of arriving and our order was out promptly as well. They were even clearing the tables quickly and preparing them for the next guest! WOW! Thank you for making our special day even more enjoyable. ☺

name: Donna
text: The staff are the best! Friendly down home atmosphere. Breakfast is excellent but lunch and dinner is even better!! Chicken capanero was the best!

name: Andy Hawkins
text: Great brunch!  Waitress very accommodating with 2 seniors and their diets.  Always a good experience.

name: Howard Clink
text: Great breakfast for an unbelievable price. Cordial servers every time. Our go-to place for breakfast.

name: Robert Ryder
text: Best spinach pie.  New experience and was amazed.  Also, one of the best burgers you will ever taste.

name: Christy Dale
text: Best breakfast and so much food for a great price

name: Gerald Williams
text: Perfect

name: Melissa Good
text: Awesome place to eat! Great prices and selection. My entire family loves it

name: Andrea Thaxton
text: My go to for breakfast..fast, filling, great value for price. Good eats, good service. Very welcoming atmosphere..

name: Aquilla White
text: Somebody please tell Becky with the yellow bedazzled nails what customer service is. Her attitude was nasty, nasty enough for me to leave a review. Golden rule treat others how you wish to be treated.

name: Amy B
text: Looks like a fun diner! The breakfast proved excellent as did the service. I like the bright kitsch decor. I'd go back for dessert! Those cakes are huge and delicious looking! Thanks for the experience!!

name: JAMES M TOWNSEND
text: Great diner layout. Specious room, easy access and plenty of parking. Friendly host and waitress. Neon lights add nostalgia.  Large wide windows, let's th rd sun shine In. Great pl as ce for a relaxing breakfast.

name: Carla Mitchell
text: This is the place to come if you want to delight your taste buds. Their menu reaches many, if not most, appetites. They start you off with warm bread and butter. I ordered the fried pork chops with mashed potatoes and gravy. They were so tender I didn't really need a knife. If you like rice pudding you won't be able to stop yourself with theirs. This establishment is highly recommended.

name: Laura Neal
text: If you want a place with options this is the place to go. Seated quickly. Exceptional service. I ordered breakfast and it was seriously the best I've had at any restaurant.

name: Sylvia Davenport
text: Fast service, clean and breakfast food s were cooked just right

name: Jaeda Ewings
text: Food was delicious! They have a variety of meals to choose from and the cheesecake I ate was absolutely amazing!

name: M.A. Buchannon
text: Always Great Food and Service

name: Chris Morris
text: Enjoyed the food. Ate outside and it was a nice summer morning out there. Our cups/coffee were already full and weren't rushed out, even after we were done eating.

name: Rebekah Whitten
text: Great variety and wonderful service.  Have eaten here twice for dinner and will return.  Very clean and welcoming restaurant.

name: Jarret Ramsdale
text: Customer service was great. Greeted and attended very well. To begin with I came for just a piece of cheesecake which was absolutely delicious to be honest. I thought it was going to be a small piece, but it was a big piece literally I couldn't finish it I didn't even finish half of it.

name: Mercedez Goff
text: I have never had a bad experience in the 5 years I've been going here! Friendly staff, amazing food, great service! We even had our rehearsal dinner here, and it was perfect! It is my favorite place to eat in the whole city, and I always leave happy!

name: Brian Marks
text: Great food and service!!!

name: lvrofjazz B
text: They have a wide variety of menu items.  Truly something for everyone. And the portions are ridiculous.... in a good way.  Two people could actually split an entree and both get full. And then there's the dessert case...... can't even put it into words! It's amazing! The prices are great.... actually cheap for the portion sizes. And the staff is super friendly! Will definitely visit again and recommend it to anyone looking for great food and great value!

name: Elizabeth Miller
text: Great chain restaurant for home cooked food! They have a huge assortment of layered cakes. This particular location gave us complimentary appetizers and had fast service. The chicken biscuits and gravy are tasty! All their breakfast foods are great! They have a book for a menu and so far everything we have tried was delicious!

name: Quantum Leaper
text:
Wonderful food, excellent service, and always clean.
The water is pure, and there is an abundance of options of food to choose from. Guaranteed to fill you up and not leave you wanting.

name: Preston Perrin
text: Great food

name: Ron Vandagriff
text: Excellent food and service.

name: Stephen Bell
text: Food is great.  They serve Breakfast,  Lunch and Dinner.  Staff is very courteous.   Food is served hot, fast and delicious

name: Roxanne Thomas
text: We went on a Sunday for lunch. We were seated in a reasonable amount of time, but waited for a server for longer than I'd like. When we were waited on, our server was nice and very good. The food was phenomenal. I had the rotisserie chicken wrap. It was delicious. This is a favorite spot so we'll definitely be back.

name: Rico the lobster
text: Very good but food was slow to come out.

name: Jonathan Dickerson
text: I ask for sauteed green beans they gave me plain no seasoning at all my fries sucked but the country fried steak was the only perfect thing on the meal plate.The server was horrible she hung up front most of the time. Place was kind of dirty also and kinda needs a update also. Was not happy at all with the first time experience was horrible and, probably will not give it a second chance.

name: Angela Christopher
text: I LOVE this place! Unique atmosphere & service is always great! Even when they are mega busy the staff manages to smile *Tips hat* They have a really nice female manager there with long blonde hair who is so generous & friendly to be around! Everyone I've ever met here is very professional & I recommend this place to people constantly!

name: Rich Whittington
text: Good food, good service, lots of menu selections.

name: Joey Cobble
text: Wonderful food excellent experience great prices big portions

name: Darian B
text: HUGE menu selection of almost every type of food style you can think of, with portion sizes to match. A great array of rich desserts to choose from as well. They also have a great garlic pimento spread for the fresh loaf of bread they bring you.

name: Danielle Kachelhofer
text: Good food. Nice manager.

name: Richard Foster
text: I keep passing this place and finally got to try it. Good food at a good price. I'll be back for the Greek feast.

name: Jarrod Lynch
text: Their Bible-sized menu had many verses, but one of the most curious was the claim that their gyros were the BIGGEST AND BEST in town. So, of course I had to try it. With every bite being a marriage of fluffy pita, succulent and seared lamb, crisp veggies and tangy tzatziki sauce, I'm proud to say I'm a true believer.

name: Vishnu Kommineni
text: Decent portions for the price. Quick service. Friendly staff. A very American feel.

name: mike klempin
text: New owners have gotten very chancy on portion sizes.. everything is now weighed

resp.text: Hello Mike, how did you determine we weigh everything?  Are you referring to the breakfast, lunch, dinner or cake portions?  In fact we have made no intentional changes to reduce our portions.  In fact our slogan is "No One Leaves Hungry".  Hope next time you dine with us you will be satisfied.

name: Ja'Lissa Williams
text: Service 5 stars, food 3 stars. Hence the 4 stars. They give you really large portions of food for super cheap. However, they fall short on the flavor side. My fiancé and I shared the chicken and waffles and the chicken rollatini served with salad, seafood bisque, & cheesecake. The cheesecake and seafood bisque was good. Overall the experience was average. I can definitely see us stopping by to grab dessert.

name: Mike B
text: I really like the food. And the servers are wonderful. I would recommend. This place to anyone

name: brian dobbins
text: Good place for breakfast, quick, clean and coffee was great

name: Julia Law
text: Best food!! The cakes are so good and so big!!!’

name: Shawker 71
text: Service was good. Food was on par. Their desserts look amazing.

name: Sue Pitts
text:
This is a Great place to eat. It's clean and inviting. Great for business or pleasure. The employees are Wonderful. The food is consistently excellent.
The City Diner recently help host a Family Birthday Party for me. They took all precautions. Social Distanced us from others. The Waitress and service was the Best Ever. Service was Fast and Caring to all that attended. Everyone ordered from their extensive menu. Every plate was wonderful and each person Loved the food. Some had not been there before but said they would definitely be back. Managers, Hostesses, and Wait staff are Great.

name: Julie Spears
text: Their Greek Pasta Sample Plate is amazing! Their cakes and pies are phenomenal too.

name: Thelonious Jazzman
text: Great place to eat! Lots of cuisine choices - Mexican, Greek, Italian, American, &c. I had a vegetarian quesadilla, which was very good. Excellent service. Atmosphere is a little lacking, which is why I have it four stars. Desserts are 10 out of 5 stars! Amazing choices. Great place to go just for dessert and coffee! Highly recommended.

name: Sascha Blackburn
text: The cheesecakes are fantastic!

name: Bob Brune
text: Great food and personable staff.

name: JC M
text: It was clean, all the staff we encountered were very nice, service was prompt and the food was really good and plentiful. I'm glad we went on a Saturday afternoon because I've passed it at other times and it was slammed. Also need to point out the prices are beyond reasonable and the menu selection almost overwhelming.

name: David johns
text: Great place great food

name: nay ha
text: This place has some of the best homestyle cooking I have ever eaten in a restaurant. We stopped here looking for a good restaurant while traveling yesterday and they did not disappoint. The cake was delicious too, we tried the chocolate/strawberry cake. Very fast service as well. They brought us some type of spinach appetizers before our meal came out and they were so good, O forgot to ask what it was. We already have plans of going back. Can't wait to tell my coworkers to try it out.

name: Denise Jefferson
text: It was great

name: Belinda Montgomery
text: Best Hamburger Steak cooked to perfection. My husband loved the Country tried Steak..

name: somer cordes
text: Friendly survice, great food

name: Crystal McElwee
text: Awesome food. Dessert was great. More food than we could eat.

name: Regina Queen
text: The cakes are amazing.

name: Margaret Suddarth
text: Every time I visit Huntsville, this place is a requirement. There are so many different options to choose from, and I have yet to be disappointed. Last time I went, I got the Greek sampler platter - so good, you get lots of food. The desserts are awesome, and worth the money.

name: Karen BlueBaird
text: Great food and service.  Very reasonable price.  Best selection menu and desserts.

name: James Truffa
text: Good food

name: Don Proctor
text: Great place to eat. Food is very good and waiters are very nice! The deserts are very delicious....YUM!

name: Colt H
text: If you're looking for some amazing authentic food, whether it's Greek, Italian, etc this is the place to go. Located near the Parkway Place Mall on Drake Ave in Huntsville, AL. The amount of food you get is well worth what you're going to pay. The staff is also great, very friendly and always come around to ask if you need anything else. Definitely stop here and check out the food or even just their desert options.

name: Blanca Booker
text: Great place, food and staff.

name: D. Weaver
text: Great deserts, but an absolutely generic gyro with tasteless meat and bog-standard commercial fries. The high point of my meal was the coleslaw, and they only gave me about two bites of it.

name: Shawn Clever
text: Great food.  Huge Menu.  Can get just about anything and it's all good.  Desserts looked amazing.

name: Abby Murphree
text: The best cakes and cheesecakes in the world. They serve breakfast all day, American, Greek, and Italian food. It's all good.

name: chloe-symone barnett
text: Fair price, huge portions, good food for the price point. The cakes look so amazing too.

name: Cameron Sawyer
text: I will definitely be coming back here again and again. There are SO many options on the menu, and all of it looks magical! Some great looking desserts up at the counter, too! I had something from the Greek part of the menu, and it was superb! Extra large portions for a fair price, too! Lots of leftovers!

name: Leisa Kincade
text: City cafe used to be my Go To place to eat. However,  my experience today was the worst I ever had. I like  a smaller size of food so I asked to order from the kids menu, which most places don't mind a woman ordering from kids menu. With me being a first responder I dont like to be full and try to save lives, but they said No, so I ordered a loaded baked potato and it wasn't even warm enough to melt my butter!! They didn't even try to make it right!! They just lost a regular visiting first responder and my reference for Huntsville's place to go!!!

name: J -
text: From Jersey and was expecting Alabama food to be garbage but this place was the go-to. So bomb.

name: Joseph Kalsic
text: It was great, and they cooked the food just like home. They were very customer oriented and made us feel just like home.

name: Terry Allen
text: Nice place with very friendly and helpful staff. There is a large variety of foods offered from sandwiches and burgers, seafood, Italian and Greek dishes. The portions are very large. I took half of mine home as did the rest of my group. The food was very good but I would not rate it 5 stars. The service and kindness of the staff can't be beat!

name: Marcus Brock
text: Normally my wife, kids, and I like the City Cafe Diner because of their huge menu and delicious desserts. However on our most recent trip there it seemed like they were short staffed. The service was slow, they were out of several things on the menu, they had almost no desserts, our food was not good, and the dining area floor was messy. It was hardly worth the money. We will give them another try. If the experience is not better we won't be going back. I would give them a lower rating if I had not had positive experiences there in the past.

name: noplastictrees
text:
Great place, great food, excellent staff

I wanted to make sure you guys get the credit you deserve after what I witnessed today with one of your servers and that rude customer who looked like they just wanted a comped meal and YouTube views since they were filming the ongoing conversation. The staff remained professional dealing with the outrageous customer and I applaud the server for handling herself so well. We will always come back here to eat.

name: Tiara Isom
text: Great and fast service.. Very good food.. Reasonable prices..

name: Ed Ditto
text:
People were really friendly, food was great,  service was very slow. Usually service is quick.
Praying for you guys, Ed Ditto

name: Mrs59 Thirty
text: Service was fast and friendly. The food was great. No complaints here.

name: Ann West
text: We had breakfast here this morning Saturday October 26 , 2019 . Absolutely Awful my home fried potatoes literally looked like scraps off someone else’s plate ( cheese on some of the potatoes and they where mushed ) sausage looked half done and scrambled eggs still runny on the inside! French toast was edible! I’m always reminded that this is why the parking lot is almost always empty

name: Kaye Hess
text: Food was delicious & service was superb.

name: Kelly Wynn
text: The items on the special menu we're very tasty. The Alabama burger and chicken pot pie were the two specials I have tried. Service is really good, but the menu is too large. My husband ordered some biscuits and sausage with gravy and when they were delivered to the table he said the gravy was cold. I would recommend only ordering from the specials menu.

name: John Collin Powell
text: I took my girlfriend here tonight and let me tell you, it was awesome! First off, 5 stars is not enough to give this place, it deserves AT LEAST 7. The food was excellent! When I saw the big menu, I was concerned, but it was great! I had the chicken Caesar wrap, and it had such a perfect balance of flavor that made we wish I ordered two! The soup is nice, warm, and thick! Even the bread they give you was super tasty! And don't even get me started on the cheesecake! But what made my experience top notch was the service. Our waiter, Max, didn't treat us like customers, he treated us like we were real people! He was funny, polite, and a really nice guy! Can't wait to go back here!

name: Fremont Bassett
text: Great food

name: James Sandmeier
text: Always our Standby for the I don't know what I want.  Always reliable

name: ray lindsey
text: Wait time at lunch was a bit long. Servers are attentive. Food is average but you get a lot of it. Dessert case to die for!

name: G Tomlin
text: Food and service still excellent! Support them as best you can!

name: Alan Crawford
text: Great service and the food was delicious.

name: John Ethridge
text:
Always enjoy the food & down to earth atmosphere here! Love their many food options! They always have something to satisfy what I'm in the mood for!
I highly recommend them, particularly if you have never been there.

name: Jonathan Lehman, Realtor
text: Great food great service and the desserts were some of the best I've ever seen.

name: Kathy Light
text: Great food & super friendly.

name: dalene brown
text: The atmosphere was great! The hostess seated right away, the waitress was accurately on time everytime even though they were busy! The menu is non other than you'd see anywhere else and the food was brought in a timely manner and the portion size of food was more than expected! One of the best restaurants I've been to in a long time and will be goin back!!!!

name: Mossy Wang
text: Amazing service pancakes where amazing and their french toast was the same tased really good. Get the banna pancakes if u like pancakes mmmm

name: Matt Cosgrove
text: Really good food and a HUGE selection to choose from. The servers are super helpful and very friendly. I would recommend this place 3 meals a day!

name: amanda wagnon
text: Great food and friendly staff!

name: Scott Webb
text: Food was great service was better. And the dessert selection was out of this world.

name: Dale Webster
text: Great service and good food !

name: jon agrelius
text: Great clean place to eat...service was great food was pretty good...just a bit under seasoned but came out fast and hot so I would give it a solid A or 9/10...if I could I would have given it4.5 stars

name: Ian Pline
text: Small park in the middle of Birmingham rooted in the history of the Civil Rights struggle. It's pretty clean, with plenty of free parking just down the street. It was perfect for the political I attended there.

name: mayann scott
text:
I ordered the Lobster Sensation. The lobster was imitation, and the salmon was noregion slices which made the meal extremely salted. I'm very disappointed as I ordered as take-out.
They have an amazing selection of dessert. I recommend the cake or pies displayed up front.

name: Elizabeth Packard
text: Once again hands down great atmosphere for family friends and kids ALSO HANDSDOWN BEST CAKE IN THE CITY

name: Chestnut Hullabaloo
text: The only really diner I've found so far in Huntsville. Check out the dessert cases.

name: Exploding Creeper
text: This was my first experience at City Cafe. I was very pleased. I ordered liver and onions. Something I usually wouldn't do.. Not everyone can cook liver. It was amazing. Perfect just like Mom would make...

name: Jill B (Zalphinian)
text:
Paraphrased Dinner Motto: No one leaves hungry.

I have to say, they more than live up to this motto! I admit I have a hard time trying new things when I'm here, because I've loved just about everything I've ever tried. That makes it hard to try something new because you want what you've already had because it's just that good!

That said, I have never left this place without needing a to go box. Their serving sizes are 'massive' and they 'always' fill the plate. One meal here always leads to at LEAST two meals, because there's just that much left over. Despite all of the food you get, the prices are still very reasonable, if not down right cheap! Yet the food never tastes cheap in the slightest, only delicious!

It is also I'd much note that they make and bake their own desserts. Now, if the meals are amazing, delicious, and all around wonderful, then their cakes and pies take it to the next level! The serving size holds true here as well, so one slice is going to last you, and you'll likely have to order it to go.

I just can not recommend this place enough!

name: Cindy Thompson
text: The menu is the largest menu I've seen! No one should trouble finding something they want! My husband had a Greek platter and I had a breakfast combo. So de-lish!

name: Jason Dellaria
text: Insanely huge menu! But the food was delicious!

name: Enrique Esquivel
text: Good food good friendly staff Great desserts....we will come back

name: Jordan Roman
text: Fast service

name: Sherika Bass
text: I absolutely love City Cafe Diner in Huntsville, AL. The food was amazing and the service was outstanding. It’s definitely one of my favorite places to eat.

name: Patrick Fitzgerald
text: Good burgers and reasonable prices. The new location is great. If you want an old fashion, traditional burger, this is the place. They have a fantastic breakfast too. Took off a star for getting shorted on an order and they never made it right. Just an apology for the confusion. Most places would have replaced your meal, if they ruined your meal. This place did not. Just check your order before you leave and you'll never have the problem I had. It didn't stop me from going there as the food is pretty darn good.

name: Melinda Chaney
text: They went above and beyond for a special diet and it was delicious.  They were also very accommodating for a large family gathering. Great customer service.

name: Darla Suggs
text: Always good food

name: Lynne Paden
text: Good food and service.

name: Terrence Francis
text: The food was awesome, and the entire staff that I met during a busy lunch hour were very polite and welcoming. I love it. It was my first time eating there and I will be bringing my family to experience! Those cakes look GOOOOOD!!! Check out the pics!

name: Gayle Sarceno
text: Unorganized for the COVID restrictions with limited waiting area or system

name: Kay Picone
text: The food is great plus you won't leave there hungry.

name: Janet Stuart
text: Great Food, service and atmosphere.

name: Greg Parde
text: Do you know what Greek spinach pie is? Google it, just a hint it's delicious!

name: Sandi Coles
text: First time visit & I loved it. Food was delicious & hot! Only complaint I have is some of staff was not very friendly!!

name: Michael Richard
text:
The service, and attitude are always incredible.
..but I've had issues with the food lately.
My latest cheeseburger was an obvious frozen patty, topped with about 6 pieces of shredded cheese, on an over toasted bun. It was honestly terrible. Time before, my french dip was horribly gristly, and my fries were like rocks.
I love this place...PLEASE WORK ON THE FOOD!!

name: Beth Trussell
text: If you haven't been here..just go! They will not let you down. Breakfast, lunch, dinner, whatever....desserts!!!! The desserts!!! I don't want to tell you and ruin the surprise!! I don't know why I haven't heard of this place a lot more! Be prepared to take home something though. Big meals and big desserts. The staff is really friendly too but they could be rude if they want to, I'd still go.

name: Todd Keller
text: Delicious and excellent service!

name: lonnie collier
text: Love their fried potatoes

name: Anna May
text: Fabulous,fresh and authentic!

name: Sam Hefley
text: Anything and everything is good here. You wont leave hungry. All meals have large portions with more than a fair price. Good place for lunch with a friend or a date with your significant other. Dont forget to try the desserts, they're awesome.

name: Lamont Dupree
text: Good selection for breakfast. Great server! Had Grilled Skillet it was good but I'd probably order something different next time.

name: Justin Dupuy
text: Great food  lots of choices. Had the cc diners special triple decker sandwich.  Couldn't finish it. The portions are just too big

name: Warren Alford
text: Large serving. Comfort Food.  Outrageously delicious deserts!!!

name: Tamara K. James-Wallner
text: Thomas and his staff are terrific. The food is cooked very nicely, the flavors are excellent, and the price is reasonable for the quality. I highly recommend City Cafe Diner.

name: Collis Sims
text: Food portions were excellent...service was slow as far as drink refills...overall it was an enjoyable experience but the food quality wasnt great.

name: Ashley Sullivan
text: Excellent food for the price. Cheesecake was fantastic. Would definitely be back. I recommend splitting the super special meals with a friend. Wayyyyyy too much food for me. Great selection. Hard for the indecisive person who was with me to choose! Will be back. 😁

name: Jane Cunningham
text: A very traditional meat and three dinner. Huge number of menu choices, lovely desserts. Friendly servers and quick service. Come way so you can be sure to get a parking space. I highlybreccoment the pies. Family friendly

name: Joe V Howard Jr
text: Yo!!! How did I never try this restaurant!?! I'll be honest, with over sixty menu items, I didn't think this could be that good. And the full menu, breakfast, lunch and dinner, available all day. Desserts?? They have cakes and cheesecakes that are so big and heavy they'll Crack a plate! Food came out quickly and hot twice in the same day, my wife and I at lunch, and at dinner we returned with the rest of the family. Very impressed! This restaurant can manage a huge menu, and is quick!

name: gary stoykovich
text: Absolutely delicious spinach pie, Greek salad, Greek potatoes, tzatziki sauce, bread, ETC!! Husband enjoyed the seafood platter. He said it was some of the best flounder he has ever had!! Great service as well!

name: Daniel Thompson
text: Meal was good quality and tasted good. The rest of the meals at the table looked pretty great. Curious to try their other offerings. Wait staff service  was excellent.

name: Joy M
text: Amazing menu, load of options and do t forget a slice of cake or pie

name: Tracey Jacoby
text: Great food and great customer service.

name: Sheri Spuhl
text: We went with friends for a birthday celebration because it was the b'day boys choice. :>)  The portions were large. I did not care for my dinner. The server was great.  We don't care for the greasy stuff much & most items seemed like that. If you're into the style of food, give 'em a try.

name: Anita L. Mcbrayer Flannagan
text: went there for my birthday.  shrimp was great!!! eat there is and experience you will never forget! !

name: Daryl Bauer
text: Today was our very first visit City Cafe Diner we were warmly greeted and seated drink orders taken immediately and filled properly server gave us a few minutes to decide what we wanted then she came into her orders only waited about 7 minutes or our food everything arrived well-prepared piping hot cooked to order looking around the dining area everything was well kept spotlessly clean even saw some of the employees cleaning away from eating customers keeping the dining area spotless our server was excellent absolutely no complaints about City Cafe Diner one of our best experiences in the City of Huntsville we highly recommend

name: Brooklyn Fox
text: Was very happy to discover City Cafe in Huntsville. I've only tried the Chattanooga location and this one was just as good. Food was great, received food quickly and great service. June, our server, was very helpful and friendly. We'll be back for another visit.

name: Sarah Sparks
text: Always amazing food and service!!!!

name: James McKinley
text: Great food. The tour dishes are fantastic. I recommend

name: Heidi Wilkins
text: Love city cafe, the food is always perfect and the employee are great. Love the down to earth setting and humor of the hostess and waitstaff. Even the cook who brought us our breakfast had a great personality. My husband and I drive 45 min just to eat at City cafe.

name: Joshwa Moritz
text: Love this place to eat at! They have great breakfast and a great gyro for lunch!

name: Kemi Loftin
text: Good food and family friendly atmosphere

name: Perry Ogletree
text: Home style food with a twist. Tasty and good selection.  Try the Metro Club, Fish and Chips, and Fried Chicken...

name: Timothy Blake
text: City Cafe has a wide variety on the menu and portions are large. We had to change from dining there and asked for take out, due to scheduling. We were accommodated and everything was perfect. Menu items range from Keto to Greek, Italian, American favorites, and Mediterranean. Check out the desserts, and don't miss their cakes to go. Coffee is delicious by the way!

name: Levi Fry
text: Amazing variety of choices, flavors and styles. Breakfast, lunch, dinner and dessert - all amazing, and the nicest staff to serve it!

name: Thejackson Year
text: I give it 5 stars and two thumbs up! One of the top 3 restaurants I've ever been to. They have a vast selection of food items that you can't find at your average American style eatery. Breakfast lunch and dinner. The various cakes are ridiculously huge and delicious. Service is top notch. You won't be disappointed.

name: tim moore
text: Great food and service.  Desserts are incredible.

name: Scott Seeley
text: Expansive menu and excellent service make this an especially good choice for your late evening dining.

name: Trish Hill
text: Great food and service.   Friendly atmosphere.

name: Andres Pena
text: Excellent food. Excellent prices. Excellent service. Lots of great choices in food. LOVED IT!!

name: Betty Martin
text: Love it

name: S Ison
text: Yummy food for vegetarians and omnivores alike. Great staff and desserts. Good portions.

name: Dylan Henry
text: O....M.....G!!!!!!!!!!! Make sure you are hungry when you come to this place, cause the food portions are huuuuge. I'm serious, I ordered a dish, which also came with lobster bisque AND house salad. The food was fresh, as it did not take them long to bring it out. Mind you, it was a Saturday and PACKED! Nevertheless, my waitress was ON HER JOB!! She was great: very courteous and always made sure that I didn't run out of coffee and water. I then splurged and ordered the Volcano cheesecake (I think that's the name of it). I say splurged because it cost $8: folks, please do not let that throw you off. You are NOT getting some small, thin slice of cheesecake like the kind at Wal-Mart. This cheesecake slice was so big, it FILLED an entire to go box....and the to go box WAS NOT SMALL. All in all, the service was great, the ambiance was wonderful and relaxing (the 80's music was playing outside, not inside), the food was (a) fresh (b) hot (c) very delicious. And lastly, you will leave this place FULL. When you enter the place waiting to be seated, take the time to look to your right at the dessert case. Go ahead and plan out your dessert, because you won't regret it! I'm DEFINITELY going to frequent this place.

name: mario
text: A nice place to eat and the food good. The price ok affordable I mostly get water at any plsce, it clean and nice looking. It doesn't have that dingy look if you know what I mean.

name: alice solaya
text: Outstanding...we had a great meal, but if you want just desert they have a ton of fresh cakes and pies.

name: Pamela Brown
text: Food is pretty good.

name: Joy Grayson-Sims
text: Love this place.Food is execellant.Presented nicely,generous amounts. Staff is friendly and efficient. It's clean,prices very reasonable.

name: Elizabeth Smith
text: Excellent service and food, I had one of the lunch specials the New York pasta pie and WOW it was a large plate!

name: Joseph Centanni
text: Tasty breakfast spot for a quick omelet or some corn beef hash. The servers are attentive and the prices are good. Everything y0u could want quick and cheap all day long.

name: latoya moses
text: Love they food but I tried to call in for a pick-up order and the lady put me on hold for 15 minutes and I could hear them laughing and talking in the back ground. Finally I hung up thats just rude as hell

name: Marcus Bland
text: Been going here so much that I've become a regular! Natalia runs a great place. Clean and friendly! Prices are perfect for the quantity of food on your plate. Don't forget a slice of cake! 😍

name: TN N
text: Great food! The French toast is AMAZING!!!

name: Amy Kibbey
text: This is my family's favorite place to go out to eat. The portions are big and the food is good.  The menu is huge. I usually get one of the Greek specialty platters. My husband has gotten something different every time and has enjoyed it. My kids like the burgers, spaghetti, and the waffles. The cakes are amazing! You have to get a slice of cake when you are done with dinner. It is a must!

name: Denny Reasner
text: Great food, service and will I will go back again. The price of the food was very reasonable.

name: Fred Torres
text: Had breakfast this morning 🌞 the food was great and the service was excellent.

name: William King
text: The food was really good. The menu has so many options it is incredible. The varied styles 9f food can be overwhelming but in a good way. Breakfast is served all day, Italian, NY style, country whatever you want. It is all good. The best thing is that soup and salad as well as dessert come with all the City Cafe specials. The soup was cold but we saved it.  Make sure to get chocolate syrup for your cheesecake. We had to get the soup to go. And, take half our food with us. It was too much to eat but we have lunch tomorrow.

name: Chris Marion
text: The best food you will get in Huntsville delicious and worth every penny

name: Melissa Escamilla
text: Staff is respectful of conversation and has polite timing to avoid interruption. Food is yummy and well prepared. I did order my hashbrowns crispy and was glad the mistake was made and I didn't eat too many. :)

name: Rich Hoffman
text: Incredibly delicious prepared food. It’s a diner and these have large menus to meet many interests. The staff are friendly and attentive. Prices are low considering portions received. Food for all ages! It's clearly one of favorites and yes, I have become a regular there.

name: Glenn Jehle
text: Consistently good food, generous portions. Comfort food at it's best!

name: William Wise
text: Love the look & atmosphere of this 50s diner burger joint. Food is petty good too.

name: Vicki Marona
text: Good food, good service, good price, good place to eat.

name: Cyril Jack
text: The atmosphere was friendly and the food was fantastic, get more than what you pay for and even have enough for leftovers

name: Teodoro Escobedo
text: Where usually come every Christmas and every time is always an amazing amazing foodExperience

name: Ron O'Neill
text: I tried this place a few days ago, and absolutely loved it, I will be back again...

name: Ororo Munroe
text: I come here solely for the desert. The cakes are on point. If you can't decide a dessert option in the Huntsville area I highly suggest you pop down to this place they also have locations near Braves stadium in Atlanta and a couple locations in Chattanooga. The staff is fairly personable but again I'm mainly coming for the cake

name: Lawrence Gress
text: Awesome Food  I would match this place against any Diner in NY

name: Edward Troupe
text: Great meal and service

name: Jonathan Oliver
text:
Gigantic menu with gigantic portions. Everything I've ever had there had been good.
I had the chicken fried steak. Very good. Deserts are good too.

name: Tim Craig
text: We really like the large selection of food, and the desserts cannot be passed up. So many delicious choices.

name: Dan P
text: Great food, atmosphere, and a very good eatery option for anyone visiting Huntsville.

name: Julian Tibbs
text: French toast, bacon, sausage, and scrambled egg whites

name: Nicole Taylor
text: I have never eaten anything here except for their cakes, but their cakes make the restaurant deserve at least four stars. They are huge and delicious! Kind of expensive at like $8 a slice, so it's not something that we do all of the time. But I definitely recommend trying it! Their cheesecake could very well be the greatest cheesecake ever made! You could easily share a slice between 2-3 people, depending on how greedy you are with desserts!

name: Michael Turner
text: Good but both plates had hair on them!!!

name: Wiley Dean
text: Great food

name: Aminah Sanders
text: The food is almost as great as the service. One of my most favorite eateries in the city.

name: Southern Flavor 2 Seven Selma,Al
text: It's ok fake eggs watery grits half cooked sausage

name: Moses N
text: More than enough good food for two adults.

name: Holly Sanders
text: Fast service, big portions, and good food.. I got there chicken wings, they were ok not as good as a chicken wing establishment but nonetheless they were very tasty, french fries were good. There desserts are to die for..yummy..

name: Review Account
text: I suggested this restaurant as a location for a family event since I had been to other restaurants owned by the same man in Georgia and always received good food and service.  Unfortunately, I had never been to City Cafe before and was throughly embarrassed by the treatment we received there. They did not have our reservation (made a week in advance) ready and could not provide a high chair for my child. We (a mixed race party) were seated with all the other non-white patrons, including one black family of five that was crammed into table for four in the corner by the kitchen. This family was seated about 10 minutes after my party, but still only had drinks when we left an 2 hours later. Meanwhile, the white family who arrived an hour after us in between our tables was served their food promptly, and by a different waitress. Another mixed family near us only had a salad after 45 minutes. Half of my party’s orders were incomplete, and in one case missing entirely. I’ve been going to Gus’s restaurants my entire life and never received service so bad. I sincerely hope that he comes to Huntsville to observe this restaurant in action so this can be corrected. I will absolutely not be returning to this establishment.

name: Michael Salmon
text: Wide variety of food items, reasonable prices, ample parking, and deserts made for a queen! I love you his place.

name: TheBecbay
text: My favorite place to eat in all of Madison County.

name: Roz Landau
text: Cafe City Diner is wonderful.  Delicious food and they really want to make you enjoy the experience of eating out.  You have to try the cakes!  Amazing!

name: Milan Whit
text: Good food, drinks stayed full staff seemed happy and took good care of my party.

name: Torey Hicks
text: It was a great place to eat. The portions were big and the service was awesome.

name: jonathan “The Papucho” herrera
text: Love it

name: K B
text: I usually LOVE city Cafe however today was a major disappointment. First off waitress messed my order up, the food was bland and not good at all. The omlette was a joke.  The woman who was at the check out was rude and didn't seem to care that I didn't enjoy my meal. All she did was rudely mumble "did you let your server know?" The one who already messed up our order? No I did not. She already was not concerned about the order she got wrong.

name: Dorothy Campbell
text: Inconsistent cooking.

name: Lynne Thomas
text: Food is delicious with so many choices. The complimentary bread and spanakopita is awesome. The portions are so generous allows for leftovers. The specialty cakes are fabulous and a slice is large enough to share or enjoy later. Customer service is outstanding!

name: C W
text: I was greatly disappointed. Thought this was associated with the chain of the same name in Chattanooga. After all, they have the same name, menu options, the menu layout & design, the cake display, the names & flavors of cakes, everything is a rip off of the Chattanooga chain. The only real difference is the prices are higher and quality is substantially lower. We stopped in for 2 pieces of cake and 2 coffees. That cost $22! Ridiculous! And the cake tasted like it came straight from the Walmart bakery. Will not return and will not recommend.

name: Anndrea Jones
text: If I could give negative stars I would. Had several problems on Saturday when we visited. Tried to talk with the manager about the issues and let him know that we would not be back and that the only decent thing about our visit was our waitress. When I asked for a corporate number to make a complaint he handed me the menu and told me to call the number on the front. If the situation had been made right then I would have given them a second chance but I also have still not been able to get ahold of the cooperate manager to discuss the issues with him/her. It was a total waste of my time and money

resp.text:
Hello Anndrea, could you please send me your contact details so that I can discuss your recent experience at the diner.  This sounds very unusual.  You can reach me at info@ccdinerhsv.com
Thank you.

name: Dorothy Thomas
text: Awesome...fun with friends and the most incredible food.

name: Wiley Dean
text: Great food

name: C W
text: I was greatly disappointed. Thought this was associated with the chain of the same name in Chattanooga. After all, they have the same name, menu options, the menu layout & design, the cake display, the names & flavors of cakes, everything is a rip off of the Chattanooga chain. The only real difference is the prices are higher and quality is substantially lower. We stopped in for 2 pieces of cake and 2 coffees. That cost $22! Ridiculous! And the cake tasted like it came straight from the Walmart bakery. Will not return and will not recommend.

name: MK P
text: Great food! Friendly people. I wish most restaurants would serve less food and charge less. Most restaurants serve  such generous amounts, it is enough food for 3 people instead of one.  With obesity an epidemic it would make sense for them to cut back and charge less. It's become the norm for restaurants to have lots of to-go boxes visibly handy because people can't possibly eat all of the food. It's never as good reheated as a leftover. Not just my opinion.

name: Kayla S
text: Easily one of the best dining experiences I've had in my years of living in Huntsville. I must admit my boyfriend and I did not have the highest expectations due to some of the reviews I had read as we were rushed to find somewhere to eat before everything closed. We were very pleasantly surprised. The food is well worth the price; both of us took home over half of our meals because of the quantity (and who doesn't love leftovers of great food?!). The menu selection was incredible, making it a certainty that we will be returning many times to try the Greek, Italian and seafood selection. The cakes are beyond gorgeous, the slices are giant. Believe it or not, they taste better than they look. Try thus place. The service was great. Our waitress was helpful but left us alone to eat and enjoy the evening but kept our drinks full. We went during a very slow point in the day and couldn't have been happier with everything. Definitely a must visit.

name: Melissa Escamilla
text: Staff is respectful of conversation and has polite timing to avoid interruption. Food is yummy and well prepared. I did order my hashbrowns crispy and was glad the mistake was made and I didn't eat too many. :)

name: jeff means
text: The place is nice and the staff are nice BUT THE FOOD...GROSS. We ordered the chicken Marsala. They must have forgot the Marsala. Tasted like garbage. The pasta had no taste and the meat didn’t taste like real chicken; it tasted like it was processed. Didn’t eat but 20% of the meal. Took the food home and my dogs wouldn’t eat it. Also had the seafood bisque soup that tasted like it came from a can. It wasn’t very good either. They need to stick to burger and fries type meals or fire their cook. Also, their prices are very high considering the quality of food isn’t very good. That’s $50 I’ll never get back.

name: Chris Marion
text: The best food you will get in Huntsville delicious and worth every penny

name: Wes @ gmail
text: Even though it's a little "based on a formula" the atmosphere is tasteful and sincere. It's has a 50's diner or malt shop feel. The cheese burgers and fries are great. The service was good also. The place is bright and clean.

name: alice solaya
text: Outstanding...we had a great meal, but if you want just desert they have a ton of fresh cakes and pies.

name: Brandon Morris
text: Standard deli/cafe fare + Greek dishes +  the best desserts in the city. All deliciously done. Friendly staff. If I've found anything wrong with the restaurant is that there are too many choices! A favorite breakfast stop for me. Try the French toast - its incredible. Great cup of black coffee.

name: Arthur Reynolds
