text: Good food and fast, friendly service. The prices are fair and you do receive very large portions. This place stays busy but not to the point of having hour long waits. If you're looking for a quick bite or if you want to go enjoy a long meal this is a great place to go.

name: Kelley Barber
text: It is obviously not fine dining, but it is always good, clean and great service.  No surprises if you want an affordable meal - and you can choose from really almost any type of food you can imagine.

name: Mark Moore
text: I have never had a bad experience here. I have never had a dish that I didn't enjoy here. I also have never been able to finish anything I've ordered here. The portions are huge and tasty. Whether it's breakfast lunch or dinner I've had them all. I think the blonde European hostess (possibly Ukrainian) loves there. I don't think I've ever been there when she wasn't there. Hard working and polite she actually seated us and took our orders and brought our food to us last time I was there. I can't speak for everyone, but when you go to city cafe you better be hungry.

name: Susan G.
text:
Such a wide variety of food to choose from on the menu. I've tried many dishes and they have all been good.
The coconut pie is amazing!

name: Kayla S
text: Easily one of the best dining experiences I've had in my years of living in Huntsville. I must admit my boyfriend and I did not have the highest expectations due to some of the reviews I had read as we were rushed to find somewhere to eat before everything closed. We were very pleasantly surprised. The food is well worth the price; both of us took home over half of our meals because of the quantity (and who doesn't love leftovers of great food?!). The menu selection was incredible, making it a certainty that we will be returning many times to try the Greek, Italian and seafood selection. The cakes are beyond gorgeous, the slices are giant. Believe it or not, they taste better than they look. Try thus place. The service was great. Our waitress was helpful but left us alone to eat and enjoy the evening but kept our drinks full. We went during a very slow point in the day and couldn't have been happier with everything. Definitely a must visit.

name: Casey Benefield (Think A Little)
text:
The country fried steak is a double decker! More than I could eat, but amazing salad, steak, etc. It was a great place for a quick family lunch, or whatever. Great menu selection. Nice people.

The only thing I don't like, is there isn't one in Birmingham. :)

name: Mary Guinn
text: They serve a vast selection of food but it was just okay at best.

name: Brandon Morris
text: Standard deli/cafe fare + Greek dishes +  the best desserts in the city. All deliciously done. Friendly staff. If I've found anything wrong with the restaurant is that there are too many choices! A favorite breakfast stop for me. Try the French toast - its incredible. Great cup of black coffee.

name: La Toya Flournoy
text: Friendly staff, quick service, kid friendly. Great prices with large portions

name: Jefferson LeBaron
text: Really large menu, this usually makes me sceptical of the qualuty. My girlfriend had chicken parmesan, I had a Philly cheese steak wrap. Her food was okay, chicken was obviously from frozen, marinara sauce leaves a little to be desired, (it's a bit bland) spaghetti is hard to screw up. The cheese steak wrap was hot and fresh, shaved steak and cheese in a tortilla isn't really too complicated. Would go back, just keep to the simpler foods to avoid disappointment.

name: Katrina Rosser
text: Food was fair but a bit pricey

name: D Wilbourn
text: Awesome, food was hot and fresh. Staff friendly, very clean. Cost not bad either.

name: Charles Dunn
text: Today was my first time eating at City Cafe Diner. I was pleasantly surprised & will most definitely be back. Delicious large portions at fair prices. Good atmosphere & great service. I give it 5 stars !

name: Todd Sutherland
text: Food was good. Too pricey for me.

name: Wes @ gmail
text: Even though it's a little "based on a formula" the atmosphere is tasteful and sincere. It's has a 50's diner or malt shop feel. The cheese burgers and fries are great. The service was good also. The place is bright and clean.

name: Joe Hall
text: Loved it good food good people and generous serving sizes

name: Eircha Murphy
text: Little pricey

name: Cindy Pass
text: Great Greek and American food with lots of choices on the menu. The cake and pie case greet you at the door but be ready to order desert to go because you will eat so much of the huge servings of delicious food! Breakfast served all day and not just the regular fare-pages of choices as well as several daily specials to choose from. We had the souvlaki tonight with the best grilled chicken I have ever eaten. The fries were hot and the service was fast. The prices are very reasonable for the amount of food you get. And you get a basket of fresh bread and cheese spread while you wait. Can’t wait to go back to Huntsville and City Cafe Diner again!!!

name: Michael Prucey
text: Unbelievable / extensive menu.... great place!

name: Frank Wilke
text: Large selection of food to choose from. Very tasty and filling meals.

name: Suzanne Hicklen
text: Awsome food awsome atmosphere

name: Amy Clark
text: Decent food. Largest menu ever, with about any type of food you'd want.

name: Chris Hardy
text: The food is good, but the service is FANTASTIC!!! I've never had a bad experience, and I can't say that for most places.  Their breakfast is great, and the servers always keep my drink filled, and if they see I'm thirsty they'll bring me an extra.  Save room for the extraordinary selection of desserts as well.

name: jeff means
text: The place is nice and the staff are nice BUT THE FOOD...GROSS. We ordered the chicken Marsala. They must have forgot the Marsala. Tasted like garbage. The pasta had no taste and the meat didn’t taste like real chicken; it tasted like it was processed. Didn’t eat but 20% of the meal. Took the food home and my dogs wouldn’t eat it. Also had the seafood bisque soup that tasted like it came from a can. It wasn’t very good either. They need to stick to burger and fries type meals or fire their cook. Also, their prices are very high considering the quality of food isn’t very good. That’s $50 I’ll never get back.

name: James Lay
text: This place is the bomb! You want it, they got it. Extensive menu, cheap prices, good food, good atmosphere and cool decor! Today was my first visit, and I will definitely be returning often!

name: Mark Kelso
text: Will definately go back. A lot of food for the price. Chiken Pot pie was a little too dry.

name: Ellie Tabula
text: Fall hazard as you enter the bathroom due to roof leak.  I kindly brought it to the attention of the manager and she was  condescending and rude.  Food was good, fast, good portions but the coffee tasted like it  sat for hours.  They claimed the gyro was great but it was just fair.  I left disappointed.

name: Mandy Foskey
text: The cheesecake is totally awesome!

name: Travis Halliwill
text: Great place for a wide selection of food and fantastic desserts.

name: Dr. Timothy Cremeens
text: Much, so much better then typical diner food with a great menu.

name: Nate Hubbard
text: One of our favorite stops for dessert. The dessert portions are huge, a slice of cake is easily enough for 3-4 people. The service is good and even though there are a lot of locals the staff knows by name, they are always attentive to their tables, which is rare around here. The chicken-fried steak is good and the gravy is a solid 7/10, but then again, I am a serious gravy connoisseur.

name: MK P
text: Great food! Friendly people. I wish most restaurants would serve less food and charge less. Most restaurants serve  such generous amounts, it is enough food for 3 people instead of one.  With obesity an epidemic it would make sense for them to cut back and charge less. It's become the norm for restaurants to have lots of to-go boxes visibly handy because people can't possibly eat all of the food. It's never as good reheated as a leftover. Not just my opinion.

name: Crissi Patterson
text: Always excellent service and great food

name: Michelle Wynn
text: Large portions..great sevice and reasonable prices

name: Andrew Washko
text: Great Food.    GREAT People

name: Bill Koch
text: I don't know how they do it. An expansive menu and the food is always good. The food is not the attraction though, it is the desserts! The biggest slices of cake I have ever seen. The wait staff is always friendly and helpful and my experience is always good going to the City Cafe.

name: Steven Sheldon
text:
Fantastic food, great service, and massive portions.  The seafood bisque is fantastic.  It was so good I ordered another bowl to go.  Also I highly recommend the Godfather Chicken.  You won't eat it all.  Chicken and sausage and pasta with a light red sauce.  Very good.  They also presented us with a free appetizer of some kind of spinach dish.

I don't think there is another restaurant in Huntsville where you will get this quality and quantity of food for the same money.

name: Danny Heltsley
text: This place is great! Amazing selection of different kinds of food to choose from! We've been here twice for Sunday lunch while visiting family (We live in another state). I was too full from my meal to try one of the AMAZING looking deserts they have displayed as you walk in the front door. Something for everyone to eat!

name: Tasha Vineyard
text: Always a good selection and some of the very best desserts in Huntsville. Grab a piece to share or just indulge yourself. You wont regret it

name: Sylvia Sutton
text: Great food...EXCEPTIONAL customer service!!

name: Marshall Grenier
text: Great food, great service, great prices, good setting, very short wait if any and the amount of food you get is well worth the price.

name: Jon Mayeux
text: Awesome desserts coupled with great food (well prepared) and generous portions. The service was friendly, fast and accurate. It's the kind of place one goes back to again and again.

name: Erin Marie Mason
text: The food was amazing. Had leftovers for today's breakfast. The service was on point.

name: Dee Boswell
text: Food would be much better if I didn't have to share it with flies.

name: Melanie DiVincenzo
text: I love going here for breakfast. It's my favorite and the staff is friendly and attentive.

name: Gene Stone
text: Always great

name: Brandon Opseth
text: Everything here is awesome! Every time I'm in Huntsville I come to this diner. I highly recommend the waffles with strawberries and whipped cream. Mmmmm, mmmm!!!

name: Lutha X
text: Good diner experience. I love the large portions you get. They definitely don't hold back on the food. Prices are fine and the manager is always so hands on

name: Sabrina Gillespie
text: Wonderful food, amazing desserts, great and friendly service.

name: Greg Council
text: The food and selection are always great.  I always get more than I can eat, ar a very reasonable price.  The desserts are...well, WOW!  The biggest issue is that something always goes wrong.  It is never the SAME thing, but it is always SOMETHING.  To be fair, I typically show with a party of 20 or more, but still, yo uh would think they would occasionally get it all right.  Whatever.   It is such a small thing that I always go back.

name: Elaine Bridges
text: Large portions,  great service,  awesome desserts!

name: Victoria Loss
text: Good food. Awesome variety. Just keep an eye on your receipt. The meal can be rung up at a higher price than advertised. If you catch it the manager fixes it.

name: Steve Kaikkonen
text: Pretty good food,  good size portions and good service

name: Sara Ray
text: Love this place. If you can't find something you like on this menu, you are to farm picky. No one leaves hungry and you usually need a to go box for your leftovers. Deserts are beautiful as well as scrumptious. Staff is great also.

name: BigE Mon
text: Great food, and lots of it. Very reasonable prices. Lots of menu selections. Service was on pont.

name: Colin Rains
text: Everything here is good! There's such a wife variety on the menu, that it's hard to decide on what to get!

name: Joshua Romans
text: One of our favorite places to dine. We had the most friendly server and will definitely be back.

name: Gary McClimans
text: Good food, great dessert! Waitress sucked, but the rest of the staff took up the slack. Tipped them, she got nothing. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars.

name: Adria Smith
text: It was relaxing, really nice Diner and great selections.  My son was with me, he had a sore throat and the waiter, Max brought him some warm lemon and water!  My son said he felt so much better.  This was over and beyond.  Excellent customer service.

name: Johnny Nash
text: Great Food, large selection,  serving sizes and even better service. Always ask for Martha. She's a main reason I come back.  Atmosphere always friendly and inviting. I try to go once a week. More if I can.

name: Mark Jean
text: The food's pretty good always more than enough to eat. I got the spanakopita appetizer and that was perfect it was like a salad and a pie. For other meals I've had breakfast here and it was very good as well. I understand the desserts are good and they look fabulous however I just never have room

name: Cam Duff
text: The closest you will get to a true Greek dinner outside of NYC. I have yet to sample a dish I didn't love. Save room for dessert because they have the absolute best!

name: PATTY BRAZIER
text: Casual atmosphere. The food was really good and you get a lot for your money. The waitress was very helpful, plus she had a wonderful attitude. Our food arrived surprisingly fast, cooked to order, and was delicious.

name: Jeanna Romans
text: Delicious food, very clean, excellent service

name: Deanmu6uio Paulin
text:
Great food. Great service. Huge selection.
We go there often.

name: Nathan O'Neal
text: Holy cow that was a lot of food! Two could easily share a meal. That will leave a little room for a piece of cake that is, no joke, about half of a regular sized cake!

name: Dee Witt
text: Good food, casual atmosphere, friendly staff

name: Christopher Kelley
text: Fast service and amazing food...lots to choose from!

name: Henry Lemley
text: Really good Greek food and delicious desserts as big as your head.

name: Derek Battle
text: The fisherman's platter is an outstanding value and delicious, the batter so light and crispy it's almost guilt free. The service is friendly and fuss free.

name: Richard Harkess
text: Wide food selection with generous portions.  Great service and great dessert selection.

name: Ken Pischke
text: Really great place for a good old fashion diner breakfast or lunch. Really nice staff as well.

name: Bob Gohn
text: One of huntsville's finest! Great food great service. From the appetizer till the main dish came there was no lag in time like most restaurants perfect timing. Very friendly. Great atmosphere.

name: Delora Prince
text: It was o.k. Not something to rave about. Do Not try the apple juice unless you like apple flavored water....... Service was o.k. but dont expect to get offered refills......

name: Tim Clark
text: Best Sugarfree Cheesecake EVER!!!!

name: William Ogle
text: This place was a pleasant surprise, good and staff were great!

name: Michelle Shannon
text:
I wanted to like this place so bad. I ordered a Turkey club sandwich that was so dry I thought I would choke!! The bread was so thick I had to pull the edges off just to get it in my mouth.
My boyfriend had the Captain's Platter. The Calamari was like pure rubber, shrimp was overcooked & the fish tasted like frozen fish sticks from a box. Just wasn't what I expected and was really pricey!!

name: Helen Terry
text: We've been coming here since they opened and have never had a bad experience!

name: Jeannabeanna Stephens
text: Great food and service. You have to get a piece of cake! Delicious

name: Susy Blasing
text: Great service but food was little overcooked

name: Phyllis Sockwell
text: Very clean. Staff friendly, attentive, good food.  Great experience.

name: Harold S
text: Great food and the desserts..... Wow is all i can say... Talkin about HUGE portions

name: Matthew Schachle
text: This is the best place to get food in Huntsville. An enormous menu, large portions, great prices, helpful waiters/waitresses, and overall excellent service make for a great eating establishment. City Cafe Diner goes above and beyond to make sure you have a wonderful experience. 10/10 will be going back.

name: Stephen Trumbull
text:
If a place has an enormous menu, chances are none of the food will be stellar.

City Café exemplifies this. The menu is huge. Page after page of different types of food, with pictures galore. If you're not sure what kind of food your group wants, this is a good place to go. Everyone should probably be able to find something they like.

Because of the variety, though, the food itself is just OK. Nothing my group tried was astounding, but none of it awful, either. Just standard diner fare.

I won't strike this off the list of places I'll go in the future, but I'm not going to seek it out, either.

name: Alec Mason
text:
Open late with a large menu. The bakery is stocked with signature desserts, and the French toast is some of the best I've had.

I would recommend sticking to foods generally associated with diners and cafes. I wasn't thoroughly impressed with a broiled seafood platter I once ordered (I have had fried fish here which was good), but I think that a little common sense will help anyone choose the gems on the very large menu.

name: Karen Lewter
text: Great food at good prices. Lunch crowd was huge but we got very quick service.

name: Adam Needle
text: Best place in Huntsville to get a cup coffee and a slice of pie or cake

name: HOPE Christian Academy
text: This place is AWESOME! The good us good, and HUGE! The wait staff are super friendly & efficient.  The desserts are MASSIVE too!

name: Shellie Cantey
text: AMAZING! The Greek food is absolutely amazing. They are not kidding when they say no one leaves hungry! The desserts looked incredible, too (though we didn't have room for it). Do yourself a favor and go there

name: ricky evans
text: Loved it big menu very nice and friendly staff and such delicious food and very nice inexpensive prices

name: Ashlyn Byrge
text: Always great food regardless of when you go!! Great menu!

name: justin brazier
text: It was so good i will be going back.

name: Bonnie Bee
text: Huge menu, awesome food and desserts, great service.

name: Enyo x
text:
My boyfriend and I recently came to eat here after my not having been by since this location opened a few years ago. It's just as good as when it first opened and I cannot recommend them enough! My boyfriend loves dining here and wants to come a few times a month to enjoy as much of the menu as possible, and I don't blame him.

There are plenty of menu items to choose from, from American to Greek to Italian to simple deli fare and breakfasts. They really have almost everything you could want! Service is fast but you don't feel rushed, staff is helpful and patient, and portion sizes are MASSIVE. The pricing is perfect for what you get and you will definitely have leftovers!

name: Samantha Hoffman
text: I've heard good things about this place but we were very disappointed. There is a really strong musty smell as soon as you walk in, and was even stronger in the restrooms. We almost turned around and left but decided to give the food a try. Our server messed up one of our orders and we were overcharged due to this error. The food was highly disappointing. The turkey sausage was disgusting and the hashbrowns had no flavor. The pancakes were ok and the omelet my husband got was good despite not being correct. The water tasted like tap water and what I could see of a handwashing station looked grimy like it could use a scrubbing with a toothbrush. I hate to know what the rest of the kitchen looks like. The only positive was the bread was good .

name: Michaela Myers
text: Really good

name: Gregory Thomas
text: Great food and quick and friendly service.

name: Jennifer Green
text: Good food reasonable price

name: Lysle Tankersley
text: Food is great, comes out really quick and always busy

name: jeromegarrison
text: Huge menu, but I haven't found anything that wasn't good.  Grest portions and reasonable prices!

name: Bethany Williams
text: To many options so nothing is fantastic but always consistent.  Breakfast seems to be a bit better.  Huge portions most if the time seem to be a thing.  Always clean with very friendly staff who a nicely attentive.

name: Jai Miland
text: Everything about this place is awesome

name: Toy Jones
text: The service was wonderful

name: Donna Patterson
text: Food is always GOOD here.. Cakes are amazing.. My server was very patient with us.

name: MomiJuana Brat
text: Great customer service, very clean facility, really good food at a very affordable price!!❤🖤💚

name: HitechRedneck Toby
text: Great Food. Generous Portions. Reasonable Prices. The desserts are Awesome.

name: Kimberly Cox
text: Friendly good food

name: Lachlan Estep
text:
Food is always excellent, the staff is always friendly. Every time I come back home from Delaware we make sure and stop in. The four year old has to get one of the cookies as big as her head.

Seriously, don't miss out. It's a great place to take the family, there's something for even the pickiest eater!

name: Kevin Grayson
text: Wow. Every time I eat here I’m surprised at the quality of the food. Great service and prices.  Absolutely my favorite place in Huntsville for quality, price and taste.

name: Rex Hayden
text: Each of us ordered one of the specials that included soup, salad, entree and dessert. My wife's soup was terrible, and both of our entrees weren't much better.  The salad and dessert  (cheesecake) were good.  We've been there for breakfast and it's always pretty good.  Bottom line: stick to breakfast and desserts at this eatery.

name: norm ginty
text:
God father chicken was very good
Best chicken noodle soup in a long time
Nice friendly service
Good value

name: Greg Gaston
text: Excellent basic food

name: Shaun Heath
text: Good for a quick bite

name: Chris Barnes
text:
Came for breakfast. Broad variety of items on the menu. Fast service. Generous portions.

A must if you’re in or passing through Huntsville!

name: cassidi blc
text: Lots of different foods to choose from always friendly servers

name: Leif L.
text: Loved the food. Glad this place was open Christmas day. Staff was amazing and I'll be coming back another day.

name: Deshon Garth (Thee Shon Dee)
text: The food was great and the service was very good.

name: Rebecca Baisden
text: One of my favorite restaurants. They make me fresh loaves of paska bread for Easter. And every Mother's day I get my cannoli. 💕

name: Tiffany LaShea
text: After my doctors appointment  today I went for   my first time at City Cafe. AMAZING service!I had the waffles with strawberries and whip cream that  was like a piece of heaven. They have so many options. I'll definitely  be back! Thank you.

name: Gary McDaniel
text: Really good service, and food!

name: Daniel Eaves
text: Awesome place, very polite atmosphere. Extensive selection on the menu that ranges from different cultures. Recommended highly.

name: Kim Garrison
text: Food was great! Usually eat at IHop as a tradition with family on Thursday night of Thanksgiving and they were not open yet. I think we have a new place to eat now!! Love family traditions!

name: Trip Edington
text: Eh, they're okay. I went there for the first time last week and was not impressed. The server wasn't very friendly and rolled her eyes every time I asked for something. They didn't have the cake we wanted so we got another kind. The red velvet cake was quite disappointing and not the least bit sweet. She asked if I wanted it to go and I told her we wanted to eat it there. She brought it to us in a to-go container anyway then rolled her eyes when I asked for a plate; then rolled her eyes again when we didn't eat the whole thing and asked for a to-go container since she took the first one away. Next time, I'll just go to the Cracker Barrel that is next door. Their food is better and the prices might be a tad bit cheaper.

name: Shera Weston
text: Always great food and service plus good prices!! Fabulous desserts

name: Candyce Curry
text: Went with my large family for Christmas. Great service, very accommodating!  We did get a hit distracted by a dispute that another large family had with the manager that worried us. But overall it was a great experience and we a planning to return next year for Christmas. We all had a variety of things from salads to burgers to steaks and pastas. My picky little cousin even enjoyed his cheesesteak. The desserts are EVERYTHING!!!

name: Leslie Griffin
text: Large menu with LOTS of choices! Heavy Greek influence which is rare in Huntsville.  Good service and food.  - Diner atmosphere... Fabulous desserts!!

name: Ronnie Stone
text: Excellent

name: Tammie Stroud
text: We got seated right away even though it was Father's Day. The food is ALWAYS AWESOME!!!

name: Joe Dawson
text: I love the City Cafe. Great food, Awesome Desserts friendly staff... the cafe staff have always provided excellent service when my family and I have been there. I have also had them prepare food for 20 people at a Safety Lunch for work. The City Cafe was able to pull it off and make it look easy. I will be back many times.

name: Ronald Gilbreath
text: It's always been fantastic eating there I love the city cafe diner

name: Chaz Baltezore
text: Great food and atmosphere. Rather come here instead of IHOP or denny's.

name: Shannon Warren
text: Love it here been a customer for years! Great food and service!

name: Rita Whatley
text: Great food pleasent staff. Love this place!

name: Randy Bolton
text: Always great food with large portions. Fantastic deserts and the breakfast link sausages were especially good.

name: Brian Pieczynski
text: Good food

name: Charlotte M. Ellett (Charlaxy)
text: Easily the worst restaurant in Huntsville — that's their only accomplishment. They belong on Kitchen Nightmares. Large menu that's a mixture of many things, none of which they make well. All the cheapest food that you can imagine, and stale. It was dead in there, and staff seem to realize this place is a loser as well, since they have little interest in it. After dinner, they offered us dessert from their case of colorful, fake foam piles that they call cakes. I said no. They brought some anyway. It was as bad as it looked, so we didn't finish it. The manager came over and patronizingly insisted that we thank him for the cake and was insulted that we didn't finish. I was glad to get out of there. Overall, a gross experience. There are much better 24 hour diners around; actually, any of them are better.

name: lakesha
text: Was delicious 😋 wish one was here in Ga

name: Mike Thomas
text: Very large menu, nice staff, good food.

name: Bill J
text: Love it. Wife loves it.  Visit every time we hit Hville.  Food is huge. Staff is awesome.  Any dessert on the planet is here ....and its huge. Jeez.  Not a place to visit while on a diet. Even will bring out some free food for you.  Super place.

name: Rickey Bolding
text: Food was excellent. Service was great. Prices were nice. I will definitely go back soon.

name: LYNX HYBRID
text:
I LOVED eating here for the pass 2 years but recently the last two times this year and today ive became sick with food poisoning. I do hope they clean up and get their foods tasting good and not making me and my mom sick because this was our main go to eatery almost every month.

The service was slow and she seemed like she didn't like us and instead fake smiles saying only yes. While her other tables she talks for days? We noticed after paying the food score was 77 which for me too low and that's the lowest I've seen them ever had. I will not return until these things change.

name: Darrell Lee
text: I liked the environment, but the food was cold, and lacking flavor. I had the lasagna, chicken parmesan, fettuccine Alfredo combo.  I may try City Cafe again but with try maybe another meal. Their desserts were very tasty.

name: Russell Williams
text: I love this food. The menu is so varied and everything is good. Don't leave without at least taking a slice of cake home. Can't get better!

name: Ronald Gilbreath
text: It's always been fantastic eating there I love the city cafe diner

name: Gary McDaniel
text: Really good service, and food!

name: William Baisden
text: Great atmosphere, great food and friendly service.

name: Brandon Arrington
text: Huge portions and great service from everyone! The quality of my Greek salad with salmon was excellent. My wife was not impressed with her side dishes but everything else was terrific.

name: Mike Thomas
text: Very large menu, nice staff, good food.

name: Kyle Vellacott-Ford
text: The food is cheap, but you get what you pay for. I have never had a meal there that didn't lower my expectations further than the last. Service is generally okay. If you go, ask for Kevin. He is the best part of the experience. The only thing worth eating there is the cake. I don't hate the place, but I only go when my friends insist.

name: Keith Dugas
text: Very expansive menu, good portion sizes, reasonable prices, and in cafe bakery.

name: Flenardo Taylor
text: Going to do 4 stars due to the wonderful customer service. The Godfather chicken not too wonderful. no seasoning.  They give you a lot of food for the price. if you are hungry.  stop by

name: Dennis McQuinn
text: I like this place they give plenty to eat I never leave hungry. There is plenty of choices for food. My personal favorite is breakfast. They have a full menu all day.

name: shaun mckenna
text: Always great food and great service.

name: Betty L Jones
text: A great variety of foods. Hamburgers, pasta dishes, Greek, and their New York Pasta Pie is delicious! My husband enjoys their 2 egg breakfast with country ham. The service is good too.

name: Kimberly Fluker
text: Variety Variety Variety and it's good and cooked to your liking and the portions are well worth the 💰 you spend

name: Chris Hagood
text:
I love this place. When my wife and I can't decide on where to go out and eat, we eat at City Cafe Diner. The literally have everything I could want. And it's all so so good. It doesn't cost too awful much for the quality you get, and you'll leave satisfied with both the food and the service.

The Reubens are excellent. As are their pasta dishes. I'll be doing breakfast next time I visit.

name: LYNX HYBRID
text:
I LOVED eating here for the pass 2 years but recently the last two times this year and today ive became sick with food poisoning. I do hope they clean up and get their foods tasting good and not making me and my mom sick because this was our main go to eatery almost every month.

The service was slow and she seemed like she didn't like us and instead fake smiles saying only yes. While her other tables she talks for days? We noticed after paying the food score was 77 which for me too low and that's the lowest I've seen them ever had. I will not return until these things change.

name: Stephen H (Meeeep1414)
text: Im a little upset my stomach isnt bigger so i can eat more of this delicious food!

name: Diane Bartlett
text:
The worst breakfast meal I have ever had. I will  never try any of the other meals.
Service was good

name: Paper Ponies
text: Service was good but the food was not. The chicken had a processed taste and texture, like a school cafeteria would taste. It used to be good but has gone down hill.

name: Jana Russell Nails
text: Wide selection of entrees at a reasonable price with large portions.  Also able to accommodate larger groups.

name: Alex McCool
text: Giant menu, giant portions, good service, open late, even on weeknights. Large variety of food means everyone will find something they like. Split it with someone if you can because you'll be getting a lot of food.

name: PATTY JOHNSON
text: Fast friendly service and more food then anyone can eat in one sitting. Food was great tasting too.

name: Candess Austin
text: Great server, better company, awesome Chicken and Shrimp Carbonara. Salad, bread, cheese spread, and cheesecake perfect. There was a hiccup about my order and would've liked more hot bread, especially to go.

name: Brooke Graham
text: When you are craving dessert at 3 a.m... go get some of their cake.  You will not be disappointed.  Their breakfast menu is wonderful too - huge portions for decent prices

name: Sherry Farmer
text: The fact that you have a choice of every meal, bkfst lunch or dinner, & any cuisine, American Greek Italian, etc, gets points. The service was good, place clean, the food quality was adequate. Not great but not terrible. I'll probably go back sometime.

name: Kirby Stevenson
text: First time there and will not be the last time.  Very good food,  waitress was super friendly and efficient.

name: Kristen
text: Great food, great place, and your food made to order. They have something for everyone, even for the pickiest eaters!

name: Russell Williams
text: I love this food. The menu is so varied and everything is good. Don't leave without at least taking a slice of cake home. Can't get better!

name: Charles Reagan
text: Great  food at more than  reasonable price  ,very  friendly and  professional

name: Rick Bowers
text: If you leave here hungry it's your own fault!

name: DERRICK WHITTINGTON
text: Great atmosphere, delicious food. Excellent customer service.

name: Mike n Micki
text: Great prices.  Huge amount of good.  Desert and cakes are enormous.  All in all,  a place you will be eager to come back to.

name: Richard Mohlere
text: Wide variety of food. Tasty and prepared nicely. Friendly wait staff.

name: Elizabeth Rice
text: Excellent food, and top notch service.  Highly recommend it- I will definitely go back!

name: IsReaLight
text: Breakfast is always good here as well as the service.

name: Keith Dugas
text: Very expansive menu, good portion sizes, reasonable prices, and in cafe bakery.

name: Will Payne
text: Pretty good food late at night.  Crazy menu has anything you could want.

name: Dave Kwit
text: Food and server were great.  Felt like they could have afforded us a little more table room to help accommodate a group of more bearish sized guys.

name: Matthew Rosenblum
text: Almost always wonderful service. The owners are very kind to me and my family each time we come by to eat. Very clean restaurant.

name: Samuel Pagan
text: This is a new place in town, was packed. Good attention and the burger delicious 😋

name: Caleb Smith
text: Menu has everything you could ever want. Awesome desserts and even better food. The prices seem a little high, but most I am always taking food home afterwards (and I am usually a 3 plate guy at a buffet). Always love to go to this place. name: Zachary Garcia (zakzackzachary)
text:
I'm being honest with my review here-

First time, ordered misc breakfast foods, group of three. Atmosphere and people were all very friendly.

Server may have been new, but didn't get our orders correct. They came back multiple times to double check egg types, but still got orders wrong. Forgot one of our sides, bread instead of English muffin, whole egg instead of whites, etc.

Server aside though, the food wasn't well cooked. Sunny side up eggs were significantly undercooked with still runny whites. Grits were undercooked. Egg-cheese sandwich was quite soggy... Home fries were just partially mashed potatoes, not consistently mashed and very plain...

Overall just really bad, and we're really not picky. Surprising based on the good reviews here. Maybe just just had the planets align with bad server and cook?

We most likely won't return or recommend in the future. Coffee and hot chocolate was good though.

name: Brian Reid
text: We ate here while visiting our daughter in Huntsville. The menu is vast and offers several cuisines from sta dard American, Italian, Greek and more. We also had our two [picky] older grandchildren with us and a good variety of children's fare was on the menu. I ordered the Gyro, supposedly the largest of anywhere while my wife had the chili burger. Our daughter had the cherry waffle and our grandchildren had the kids Mickey pancakes and spaghetti for the other one. The food was bright quickly and was freshly made. The gyro I ordered was served as a pita wrap and had all it is supposed to have. The meat was tender and delicious and the tzatziki was freshly made. Each of us were beyond satisfied and full after our meal. I couldn't pass up desert from the 15 or more cakes at the counter. These were beautifully made and appeared to be freshly made as well. I decides to try a trio of different cakes for all of us to share and was not disappointed at all. From a raspberry white chocolate, coconut and strawberry shortcake, each bite was like a piece of heaven. Do NOT be taken back by the cost of be at $8 a slice! With 5 of us sharing the scrumptious cakes, we barely made a dent in them and brought home the leftovers. Overall, if you are looking for a classic, real diner with more menu choices than you could ask for along with amazing deserts, this is the place. Service is great, prices are incredible and the food is spectacular. I now know where to go for my next visit to Huntsville to get the best food in town.

text: The menu is a bit overwhelming. City Cafe offers so many selections that I didn't expect any of them to be particularly good - but I was wrong. I've eaten a few different meals here (breakfast, lunch, and dinner) and haven't been disappointed with any of them. And, indeed, I've never left hungry. Their portions are far more generous and filling than the low prices might suggest. They also have a huge assortment of desserts, but I must confess I've never had enough room left after the meal!

text: I have  eating here for a total of 3 times now. The first time shortly after they opened and had a good experience. The secant time i was much less impressed. Now the last time and final time i will patronize this establishment. I had the beef stroganoff that consisted of 3 pieces of meat a hand full of mushrooms and noodles. I hate mushrooms but i was able to remove them with out a fuss.It was a good thing that i like noodles, i just don't think a plate of noodles should cost 14 dollars. When i spoke to the waitress she was kind and attentive ( she got a good tip) she made the manage aware of the mushroom stroganoff, the manager proceeded to explain to me how BEEF stroganoff is made and walked away..Hmm may be all the BEEF stroganoff i have ever had in my life was made with to much BEEF.

text: Went in this morning for a rare breakfast out ... Scott was the waiter very friendly and outgoing  the cook did a great job with my food...but when the women who came in as we got our food and started to eat started yelling at Scott and was doing it with no regard to the three people in there trying to enjoy our breakfast...so a word of advice if you like listening to people being berated and totally embarrassed this is your kind of place ...if on the other hand you like me would rather if she had a problem with one of her employees she should take him to the back and talk to him with respect and treat him like a human being...and if she is not happy with his performance fire him...but the way she treated him I won't treat a dog...so I will never be back and hopefully if enough business is lost the owner will find a decent manager

name: matt Swearinga
text: The food was good fast and service was friendly.. Ann Marie  is one of best waitress  I have encountered  in years. Her smile makes you feel welcome and her attitude is the best.. She makes you feel at home here and for a Trucker that means allot.. Keep up the good work...

name: Tim Darnall
text: Terrible experience after waiting 45 mins for food. They had all our orders mixed up. They were out of French fries. My Turkey sandwich smelled like fish. Will never return. Needs shut down or I highly recommend better managing.

name: Ann Hampton
text: If you are African American please do not stop by here. My husband and I was never properly greeted. Our food was half  cooked. Our waitress Amanda completely ignore us. The grits were thick, and disgusting. I also went online submitted the promo code for the survey  and complained. I submitted a complain on Google,  yellow pages app, and Facebook under the Huddle house and Lincoln, Alabama. Someone from huddle house will be calling soon and I will complain again. If you are black please RUN. I was hungry when I arrived and I was starving when I left.

name: Angela Downey
text:
The waitress was nice. The coffee was good.
Other than that it was a terrible experience.  All of the food was cold except the waffle but probably because we had them remade because they weren't dark enough.
I had to send back the eggs because they were over easy instead of over medium. The remake still wasnt cooked enough. The butter on the toast didn't melt because it was so cold. You'll be wasting your hard earned money eating here.

name: Lake Kraken
text: Hair in my food. Bugs on the window sill. Ordered onion rings and my brother got them with his order and I got tater tots. They didn't have fries. Also mixed our orders up. Never coming here again. Around 12 o clock.

name: daniel larson
text: Although some of the staff was friendly, they tried to make me pay for food I did not order.   I left and left the food. I've been in this store a few times and its always hit or miss.  Mostly miss. This was the last time I will visit. Instead, go to the 24 hour diner next door. A little more price wise and takes a little longer for them to cook your food, but the food is better and always nicer staff.

name: Haleigh Hayes
text: Great cooks and good food. You can tell that the staff here needs better leadership. Everything was great but it seems like a couple of waitresses didn't know the menu.

name: Ronda McBride
text: We've been coming to this Huddle House every summer for 19 years...and have always loved it. But today was a very different experience.  They seemed to be short-staffed...at least I hope that's all it was because the service was bad and the food was even worse.   (And the men's restroom was a health hazard.)  I'm not sure if we'll be back.

text: This store is amazing the best management and team I've seen in years I love the atmosphere and food price great service great team well trained and truck parking you cant ask for more

text: Don't do it!!! the customer service is non existent and the food was nasty. The staff was incompetent and rude.

text: Biscuits so hard my fork broke. No seasoning on the food. Sausage gravy does not have sausage in it. Too expensive!!!!!! Paying for garbage is dumb, don't do it. I've been to this same location twice now. The burger was not edible then either. Close it down!!!!

name: Krazy Place
text: Fast food but dine in. Tons of drama, and staff spends most their time in the back. Watched cook take food to table with gloves on then go back and start cutting items. Heard they ran out of product. Disappointing!

The waitress behind the counter was crying, literally tears rolling down hear cheeks, crying to a customer about how every other phone call was an order. Really!? It's  a restaurant, you should expect orders coming in.

name: Clarence Shorter
text: Today was an amazing day. Denny’s in Florida on exit 285 connected to the flying J has one amazing staff. I was greeted by the Manager (Jerry) who has the best customer service I have seen in a while. Quickly seated by a host (Alexis) and served with a pleasant greeting, here comes the fun part. My server (Cyndi) gave me meal choices like no other also made a batch of sweet tea at least I felt like it was just for me. If your ever coming down ( I-75 ) please stop by exit 285 and visit Denny’s and have an amazing day.

text:
Not unusual for location. Employee's have no work ethic or self worth of wanting to do a good job.
Called 4 times to place an order to pick up between 9:10pm ... 9:45pm. Phone constantly ringing with no answer.
A few days ago same thing.
However when I get to location they are still open.... Luckily I can something from Flying J.

1 of the top 5 worst Denny's I've ever been too.
DON'T STOP JUST DRIVE BY

text: Unprofessional, uncaring employees. Wrong food, undercooked, everything that could go wrong did. I literally think they must be trying to close the place down.... there’s no way service can be that bad and it not be intentional..... they had an attitude when we wanted our order fixed.... I’ve never had such a horrible experience in my life....

text: One server good the entire place and we were served quickly! Nice job. Visited April 10, 2021 around 11a.m. good was perfect also. No complaints.

name: Vicky Mortensen
text: Service was terrible. Stopped in one time and took forever to be seated then sat there for 10 minutes and  never had anyone come out to wait on us. They weren’t busy and the employees could be heard in back talking. Just stopped in there again and there were several customers and we were told they were only doing to go orders. We will never stop there again and will not recommend them ever! Giving them 1 star is more than they deserve!

name: Crystal Purvis
text: We received our food and it was good. I believe the restaurant industry has been hit pretty bad with the lack of employees in these establishments. A lot of waiting, but the employees that were there seemed to be doing all they could do. It wasn't terrible.

name: kb3svj
text:
They tout being open from 0600 to midnight. They stopped  seating customers before 1830 hrs, and are only taking orders for take out. NOTE TO DENNY'S: AT LEAST  POST  A REAL TIME  SCEDULE OF WHEN YOU QUIT ALLOWING IN HOUSE DINING. WE TRUCK DRIVERS WHO   ARE RUNNING OUT OF DRIVE HOURS CAN OPT TO FIND A REAL RESTURANT AND NOTTTTTTTT WASTE TIME STOPPING HETE IF YOU WON'T LET USE EAT, TO GIVE US A BREAK FROM HAVING TO SIT IN A TRUCK THAT WE HAD TO DRIVE/LOAD/UNLOAD/ INSPECT /UP TO 14HRS RESPECTIVELY PER DAY.

OR

MOVE OUT OF THE TRUCK STOPS AND LET A REAL RESTURANT HAVE A CHANCE OF SERVING THOSE WHO SPEND DAYS AND WEEKS AT A TIME FROM HOME.

text: The waitressing staff made me think of a sloth, they literally moved that slow and acted like they didn't want to be there. The pot roast sandwich that I ordered was actually good. The chicken fried chicken my son ordered was was over deep fried and at that point we were done.

text: Great service and best value around. Friendly staff. A must stop for a budget minded trip.

text: There was a really good hostess that was there when I went she took my order, she was really sweet and my food was good and hot. On the other hand the waitress that was working the floor there, which took my parents order she was walking around like she was high or something. She was like half sleep and moving like she was in slow motion. That made my mother's order take much longer, and just made It weird to eat there.

name: Jessica Cannon
text: Stopped in for late breakfast on a Saturday morning.  Big mistake.  Waited entirely too long for our food, in a restaurant that barely had anyone else there. Out of 3 meals there was undercooked bacon, cold and burnt hashbrowns, and ham that was definitely out of a sandwich meat package. Every employee in there acted like they didn't want to be there.

text: Went in around 8pm, I got a Philly cheese steak and the wife got a burger. The Philly was cold as could be yet the cheese was melted. Guess it wasn't in the microwave long enough. The burger was the exact same way. Will never go in here again.

name: Robert Yore
text: Place only half full. We waited 30 min. And didn’t get the water we ordered. Waitress never came back to take our order. Finally left.

name: Lisa Wakeley
text: They were understaffed, but the employees were very friendly & apologetic for being short staffed. The food was great!

name: leah godwin
text: This well known restaurant is located inside the Flying J center..the place is nice and clean with helpful and friendly staff and the comfort of a menu Americans know while traveling. Great place to eat while getting good priced fuel and supplies at Flying J.

name: Kevin Kennedy
text: I came to this establishment on tonight , and I was extremely pleased. They were really busy however they very pleasant, witnessed the manager walking around thanking the other patrons for the patience, and he making  sure everything us good. An older couple walked in a sat themselves when the waitress told them it will be a few minutes till they could be seated. These people then preceded to become rude the the young lady whose name was Elizabeth, she went to get her manager and he approached the couple and introduced himself as Freddie, the man told him that he need to slap some sense in to her. Mr Freddie told him nicely but sternly, due to the fact than I’m a man I don’t hit women and if he continues to be rude he would have to leave. Mr Freddie then said what can I get you to drink, man called mr Freddie a racial slur, and to my surprise Mr Freddie said God bless you. Kudos mr Freddie

name: jackie watford
text: It was a quickly made to go order of a burger that ironically coming from within a truck stop gas station was pretty good

name: SUZANNE MILLER
text: Service was s l o w.  Grits were big cold  lumps full of butter and the omelette was scorched and had no toppings on the top like the menus showed.  People that worked there did not wear their mask over their noses and acted like they could care less if we left of not.  I would give them a -0 if it was an option!

name: jose barreto
text: Excellent! Nice people and GOOD SERVICES 👍👌👏😀😊

name: Eva Alas
text: Had to wait a little to be seated and for the food, but it was worth the waith the food was very good

name: Jose Eduardo Amezcua
text: It has a lot you can stop by to get something to eat and a fresh beverage. It also has a Dennys just in case you need a big meal

name: Monica Bundrum
text: They were short staffed in the kitchen. It took a long time to get our food, but it was delicious.

name: jamarcus collins
text: Customer service could of been better but great food

name: Cool Channel
text: Bathrooms clean.  Parking sufficient!

name: Darell “SNJ” Chaffin
text: Great food, friendly staff. I recommend this place.

name: Alexis Maestas
text: Worst Denny’s I’ve ever been to the wait staff had an attitude, the food came out burnt and all out at different times.. do better.. I see this is what y’all are allowed to do cause of all the low ratings honestly y’all should have zero stars.

name: terrell rhodes
text: Used the app to order but everything was ready when I got there and food was good

name: Macy Brooke Davis
text: The food was good but the service was awful. Had to wait for our food way longer than we should have. Also, took forever to give us receipts and never refilled our drinks.

name: Joe Kennedy
text: Eggs and hash browns were overcooked services were slow. The servers were knowledgeable and courteous.

name: Cha Cha Morgan
text: Friendly staff and good food.

name: David Walker
text: ITS Food. DENNYS doesn't always impressed but you usually get what you expect from them. Over all not bad.

name: Otis Todd
text: The pancakes are nice but the sausage and eggs could use some work on taste. For the second time I've had items I ordered left out. I'll be sure to check my bag before leaving in the future.

name: Tanya Black Young
text: It's clean. Easy to get in and out of and has good service

name: Matt Jones
text: Great food place with amazing massage chairs in waiting room

name: Darlene Y
text: Menu said Thursday potato soup. Nope veggie beef. So ordered country fried steak.  Food was done when I was told no gravy. NO GRAVY?!? The grand slam sausage links were still pink inside. Didn't complain just paid bill & left. Next road trip steering clear of this Denny's

name: Lori Godshall
text: Worst Denny’s ever. I have had Nachos at other Denny’s. These were not made in store like others. All the toppings were put in separate cardboard box. It soaked completely thru. Apple crisp was cold. Never again.

name: Virginia Reynolds
text: They were very courteous upon entry they assisted to make sure you found what you need it was very clean gas prices I liked and I will definitely go back😊😊😊

name: tj seibert
text: Wait staff was good food was okay not exactly what I ordered but edible

name: David Ommert
text: Slow,slow,slow! And had to change my order three times because nothing was thawed out! 🤷‍♂️

name: Joyce O'Brien - Bell
text: My chicken was dry, over cooked. Patty melt sandwich was good.

name: James Hawkins
text: Hostess and wait staff  great. Food was  prepared  very well.

name: Dean Lee
text:
If the wait staff were good then my rating would if went up one star..
Cold coffee bad attitudes,,
Drive by this One if you can...

name: Paul Hilyer
text: Poor waitress service. I ordered the Slam, a signature dish, for Denny’s. The pancakes were flat and rubbery. I suppose the manager who was at the register was unhappy. She didn’t even thank us for our patronage. Last stop here.

name: John Steiner
text: Nice place. Sitting at table to eat .

name: Jasmine Milliner
text: They were out of everything  no sodas no juice all they could offer us was grapefruit juice tomato juice coffee and sweet tea (which was not sweet at all). Once we got our food waitress never came back to check on us i would have to go get her attention.

name: krystal blanchette
text: Literally the worst food I’ve ever had in my life. Everything was cold and the mayonnaise was spoiled and sour. The young man that waited on us was very pleasant and apologetic however the food was not good at all!

name: Ronald Smith
text: Clean and very friendly associates with great customer service. Highly recommend. The food was awesome.

name: John May
text: Terrible service!! Very slow. Food was o.k.

name: Bryce Cleveland
text: Throw a small serving of steak, an even smaller serving of veggies and some watery cheese sauce on a hot dog bun and call it a mega Philly steak sandwich. Wow, so disappointed. And only 2 tables (me being 1), the service was horrible. Not going back to this location. Not worth it

name: Pixie Doodle
text: Service was very slow. Food decent.

name: joyce McCullough
text: Love the breakfast plates at Denny's. When my sister and I travel we always look for a Denny's because of the wide variety of choices and anything I've ever ordered has been great!

name: Shar Haven
text:
So far, weve been seated, got drinks, my husband got coffee, had to wait 10 minutes for cream and sugar, had to use his knife to stir the coffee.....so far one of the worst ive been to! Not a happy camper!
Addition...had to wait for half of my order, didnt even get some of my order. The food was flavorless. The staff was slow and horrible! Thru our entire meal, my husband had to wait 20 minutes for just a cup of coffee!!
DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!!!! Go get fast food, at least your order will be right and hot when you get it!!!

name: Leeanna Gates
text:
Nice ppl clean area but wait time was long
Steak was supposed to be medium it was well done and chewy veggies and taters were good

name: krystal blanchette
text: Literally the worst food I’ve ever had in my life. Everything was cold and the mayonnaise was spoiled and sour. The young man that waited on us was very pleasant and apologetic however the food was not good at all!

text: They were out of everything  no sodas no juice all they could offer us was grapefruit juice tomato juice coffee and sweet tea (which was not sweet at all). Once we got our food waitress never came back to check on us i would have to go get her attention.

name: Ronald Smith
text: Clean and very friendly associates with great customer service. Highly recommend. The food was awesome.

name: Donna Rooks
text: Food was good...service terrible. Manager not enforcing Covid rules. Some Servers had mask pulled down under chin the entire time we were there and at the tables. They pulled the tape off the table next to us and sat a family of 4. 🤷‍♀️

name: Leeanna Gates
text:
Nice ppl clean area but wait time was long
Steak was supposed to be medium it was well done and chewy veggies and taters were good

name: Jerry Griffin
text: Good service, restaurant is clean and ready for business. Great food.

name: Tony Dorr
text:
Dryest toast in the south!
My particular waitress seemed like she'd rather be having teeth pulled without novacaine. Not once during my meal was I asked if everything was good, if I wanted a refill etc. When I went to check out she was just leaning on the wall by the entrance playing on her phone.

name: Bryce Cleveland
text: Throw a small serving of steak, an even smaller serving of veggies and some watery cheese sauce on a hot dog bun and call it a mega Philly steak sandwich. Wow, so disappointed. And only 2 tables (me being 1), the service was horrible. Not going back to this location. Not worth it

name: nimajneB
text: Took forever. Messed up orders.

name: joyce McCullough
text: Love the breakfast plates at Denny's. When my sister and I travel we always look for a Denny's because of the wide variety of choices and anything I've ever ordered has been great!

name: George Mata Jr
text: Same as most with denny's restaurants pu an go

name: Jack Edwards
text: Food was good ,once the waitress  got to me(took a while) she did her job well

name: Juan Parra
text: Great food like always

name: Branden Pratt
text: Not enough vegan options. Why is it so hard to have plant-based pancakes available? And there are always brown spots on their broccoli. I do however, enjoy their Beyondburgers. I wish restaurants like these would make it easy for truck drivers on a vegan diet. I will say that Denny's is better than IHOP so far.

name: Susana Dorn
text: I ordered a pancakes and when I'm ready to eat it while still hot. Guessed what! No syrup!!!!👎🤨🤔🙄

name: Mark Reeves
text: Pretty deserted on Christmas Eve but good food and service.

name: Jake Conley
text: Thisblocatoon isn't bad at all. I love my coffee and each cup was fresh and hot. Unfortunately didnt have any biscuits or I would have ordered biscuit and gravy but cant go without the black coffee.

name: DoubleK
text: Nice young lady got my order together.

name: Ken Parks
text: Excellent...I moved here from Texas and this is the only Denny's I know of in Alabama. I was missing eating at Denny's.

name: Sharon White
text: The service was awful. Would not recommend

name: RANDY GOULD
text: I'm sorry to write my first poor report but I've got to do this. The waitress was great. We were greeted with respect and seated quickly. The family and i have been in the car for 5 hours and I realy wanted a big healthy meal. I asked the waitress which meal was better and out of the two she said the Philly prime melt is a great choice. I told her i don't want fast food and would like to get rid of the fries. She offered mash pot and brown gravy. Its sounded so good. Then my kids meal came out. What a joke. For ten dollars I got nothing and I'm still sitting hear at the table hungry.  I took a picture after one bite of mash pot and easily ripped apart the melt. so what you see is what I got. I'm a grown man not a damn kid. And don't get me started on the what my 3 kid's meals looked like. And the misses salad was short on its toppings. Here is what the menu shows and this is what I received. Worst money ever spent. I would of rather had McDonald's.

name: George Mata Jr
text: Same as most with denny's restaurants pu an go

name: Juan Parra
text: Great food like always

name: Jake Conley
text: Thisblocatoon isn't bad at all. I love my coffee and each cup was fresh and hot. Unfortunately didnt have any biscuits or I would have ordered biscuit and gravy but cant go without the black coffee.

name: DoubleK
text: Nice young lady got my order together.

name: Troy Stafford
text: Menu was great. People excellent. And food delectable

name: Branden Pratt
text: Not enough vegan options. Why is it so hard to have plant-based pancakes available? And there are always brown spots on their broccoli. I do however, enjoy their Beyondburgers. I wish restaurants like these would make it easy for truck drivers on a vegan diet. I will say that Denny's is better than IHOP so far.

name: Sean Bonds
text: The young lady's that work there are great. I had a sort of complicated order and they took the time to listen and got it right the first time. I was happy with the overall experience.

name: Ken Parks
text: Excellent...I moved here from Texas and this is the only Denny's I know of in Alabama. I was missing eating at Denny's.

name: Jesse Brown
text: The food and service was very good and fast too! Thanks Denny's for a very good experience.

name: Sara Terrell
text:
This was the worst restaurant we have ever been to. Took 20 minutes to even be asked if we needed to be seated, then took over an hour to get food, we didn’t receive half our order, and then asked for our pancakes and only got 1 set, had to get up and go get our own salt and pepper and napkins. Then had to ask for syrup, refills, and the check. All she brought was Togo boxes. As we checked out we told her we didn’t receive pancakes and that we shouldn’t have to get up and get our own napkins or ask for stuff. Then she laughed and asked if we wanted our pancakes when we are obviously at the counter to check out. A truck driver walks in to talk to the manager and then proceeded to tell him the waitress working the night before rushed him and another driver out because they closed at 9 and it was almost 9.

Needless to say don’t waste your money or time here. Total time at restaurant, and hour and half.

name: Carll Smith
text: Not a Denny's in this country. That knows how to cook eggs.

name: Andy Reed
text: Outrageous place, ordered at 6.22 to go, order came out at 6.32 and was placed on the counter. At 6.50 asked where is my order ( was there waiting) he reached out and gave it me!!! I told them i dont want that one because its being sitting there for 20min and asked for remake. 3min later gave me the same one but microwaved thank you but never again im eating at any Denny's

name: Samantha McCammon
text: Great waitress, Elizabeth and good food

name: Annette Brown
text: It was great! Service great.. The food was great!

name: Kristal Harris
text: After traveling all day, we had a great meal and warm service at Denny's in Alabama. Thank you!

name: Juls Hoffman
text: Server was efficient and food was hot!

name: Zenen Pizano
text: Exellent attention from Kristina who attends Denny's.

name: Mildred Suttles
text: Great food great service the manager chasity kept our cups fulled from the time we got up and out

name: Tammie Orellana
text: Love The Food And the Service very Friendly!!!!!

name: Wiley Wedgeworth
text: Was wonderful other than the table being unclean when seated

name: Matthew Manning
text: Great service. Convenient location. Social distancing observed. Will stop in again.

name: Harry Williams
text: Slow service  food is okay but the tea taste like dirty dishwater ask for paper cup their glasses are dirty

name: CHRIS MCCLELLAN
text: Horrible stood 10 mins as 2 workers passed by 4 customers 5 times saying just a min while doing nothing

name: Martha Austin
text: There were 10 of us and they had a place ready before our group could even get inside. Food was great and lots of it. Kids plates were big enough for adults!

name: Dick Jones
text: Meh.  Denny's .  Meh service.  Meh food.

name: Marisa Mancilla
text: You could hear ppl cussing  in the kitchen while we sat in the dining  room.. One of the cooks was smart towards our waitress  because she forgot they were out of chicken tenders for what my husband ordered..

name: Raquel Millas
text: The lady was nice ,polite,  fresh food !! Only 3 start cos the coffe oh my horrible, cold and taste like it was in a coffee maker age ago

name: Wanda Phillips
text: Denny's is definitely the place to eat.  There food is delicious and delivered quickly.

name: Vanessa Mims
text: Very clean with no wait (usually). Friendly staff and good food!

name: Nikki Dole
text: No mask, no service.. only so many people allowed in and certain tables are still blocked off, haven't quiet figured out how to eat with a mask on. Oh well, another restaurant gladly took our money!!!

name: Curtis Bradberry
text: I brought my football team into dennys in hopehull and the man manager took good care of us and we will be coming back he had good customer service ive been to a lot of places but I've never been treated like that

name: Ronald Hidalgo
text: Fast friendly service, food was amazing 👏

name: Taylor Dobbins
text: The absolute worst!! I have never encountered a hostess/waitress that was so rude. When we were seated, we ordered drinks and after 10 minutes, we still didn't receive them. We watched as others got their drinks and food before we decided to walk out. As we get to the front, we see our "waitress" standing around the counter hanging out, talking, with two other employees who were also ignoring their tables. This place is poorly ran by the manager, who stood there doing absolutely nothing.

name: david clark
text: Good food and good service

name: Tonia 1111
text: Went to denny's in hope hull Alabama to eat, and the food and staff was amazing,  would recommend 👍🏽

name: Travis Sorsveen
text: Exhalent service. Waitress was on point. Clean ,and able to dine in. Nesha is awesome..

name: Superman Staton
text: Good service, food was good.

name: chris brown
text: Food was good service was awful

name: Chasity Blalock
text: Although understaffed, the service and food were great

name: Joseph Hughey
text: Food is overpriced and they don't have change so you get screwed twice

name: Darryl Eubanks
text: The food was bland, looks like food out of the frozen section at walmart.

name: David Ware
text: Very good food and customer service at this location.  Friendly staff.

name: Tina Hughes Bundy
text: Service was very nice. Food was filling , but bland.

name: David Howard
text: Good Denny's. Good food.

name: Lindsey Simmons
text: We just had dinner, and not only was service slow (with only 3 tables to wait on), the food was soggy, wrong, and undercooked. Two tables left because they couldn’t order. Another had the wrong order. Probably the worst service we’ve ever had. If I could leave 0 stars I would.

name: Ashley Garrison
text: Good food bad service

name: justin swartz
text: The only people in there when we, four people,  placed our orders. Two came out wrong, one was burnt almost beyond any recognition,  the other was so undercooked that it had a raw crunch to it and after food was delivered some had to wait for the waitress to get back from wherever she disappeared to for five minutes to tell her we needed eating utensils. Ridiculous

name: Sharon Watkins
text: Food was good but I don't think the waitresses like their job very well not very nice

name: Donna Rooks
text: Food was good...service terrible. Manager not enforcing Covid rules. Some Servers had mask pulled down under chin the entire time we were there and at the tables. They pulled the tape off the table next to us and sat a family of 4. 🤷‍♀️

name: Angela Smiley
text: Food was very good and the waitress was very nice

name: Corey Mann
text: Make sure to stop everytime I go to Letohatchee

name: The Chad Beck
text: Food is Good and people are awesome and the Pilot it's attached to make it even better !!!

name: Larry Cross
text: The experience was terrible. We arrived and spoke to 2 ladies and asked for a table for 3. We then sat there waiting 10 minutes just to have 1 of the ladies seat someone in front of us. Another lady who had been seated made a complaint and her party left before their food was served. She told me the service is terrible and its a good thing we were not seated. I then asked the other lady to speak to a manager. She told me she would get one. After 10 more minutes of waiting for the manager, the same lady approached me and told me she was the manager. Now why would she tell me she is getting manager have me wait 10 minutes to come back and tell me she is the manager is totally rude and unacceptable! She is also one of the ladies we had spoke to about a table for 3. As a driver I have never been treated this way and have customers of an establishment tell  me not to dine in a restaurant. I will make a bad review in every and all online websites due to this dennys. Thank you for a horrible experience after a long day working. If you have negative stars it would be a -5.

name: Larry Fairleigh
text:
Exit 158 on the I65 south to mobile  excellent place for breakfast, good food, very very nice wait staff.
Highly recommend the Santa Fe skillet, but you better be hungry

name: Mrs M
text: Horrible service. Under cooked food. Will not be going back.

name: Shikino Olds (Kiwi)
text: Running from Hurricane Irma & ran into a Denny's. Trucker appreciation this month we got $5 off our meal. Hash browns could have been cooked more but our server Alexis was amazing. Very attentive

name: Felix Martin
text: Always good food. Great staff

name: Roshanda Carr
text: This was the worst Dennys I have eaten at. The service was awful and also the food. I love Dennys but I will never. stop here again. They need new management asap if not then they need to close down asap.

name: ben shelton
text: Says they are open till midnight. Went in at 10:30 and they tell me they're closed.

name: Ben Denny
text: Delicious.  Totally enjoyed being to be able to sit down and eat

name: Larry S.
text: Love their ultimate omelette

name: Angela Smiley
text: Food was very good and the waitress was very nice

name: Jerry “Big Jerry” Taylor
text: Fantastic food and service

name: Rick Paul
text: An American diner with breakfast, lunch, and dinner at a reasonable price.

name: Felix Martin
text: Always good food. Great staff

name: The Chad Beck
text: Food is Good and people are awesome and the Pilot it's attached to make it even better !!!

name: john Kozloski
text: The staff was arguing and cursing in the dining area in front of customers the food was horrible we couldn't even eat the sausage links they were undercooked and all of our silverware was dirty so was the people next to us there's were dirty too. We will never be back to this place ever.

name: Dipper Max
text: Service was slow and the food wasn't that good

name: misty creel
text: The food and service was excellent!

name: kuinajia williams
text: Great food great service with Kuinajia! My family and I will be returning.

name: misty creel
text: The food and service was excellent!

name: Vacarro Jones
text: Walk in and yell loudly to be seated, otherwise they will remain seated.  Tuesday night. Or just order online.

name: Judy Taylor
text: The place looks nice and modern. Staff was great. Food was delicious. Didn't have to wait long. I love the atmosphere. We plan to go back.

name: Kayla King
text: Hair was in my food and they charged me for jalapenos when I NEVER have been charged before. My 30 minutes break turned into an hour waiting on them. Nothing was done for compensation for the hair and having to remake! Go to another dennys or eat the pilot food because this place has lost my business and I spread it to my trucker friends as well.

name: Jana Gallahar
text: The food was hot and it was not good at all the scrambled eggs were like water i dont know it it was just the cook or what but i know i wont go back for a long while

name: Николай Новицкий
text: Check in 7.20; Check out 9.00. 👍

name: Myrna M.
text: This was the absolute worst meal at a Dennys ever. Too greasy and much overcooked. Should have throw plate out. We eat at Dennys often at home and traveling. We have eaten here before, Ext 158 on I-65 in AL, a few times 2 or 3 years ago and okay but today horrible.

name: Devin Strong
text: This was the worst experience I have ever had any Denny’s restaurant the waitress was rude and slow as can be once she brought my food out it took her a solid 10 minutes to bring me my silverware and then had the nerve to ask me if I wanted her to microwave my food

name: Darlene Blevins
text: Took my mom (who has dementia) here for Christmas not expecting much.  The waitress was completely AWESOME!  The food was great too.  The waitress recognized our situation and she guided mom thru her order, was so kind and attentive, was happy and funny and full of Christmas cheer!  Made my kinda sad day so much brighter!  I was very impressed!

name: Vacarro Jones
text: Walk in and yell loudly to be seated, otherwise they will remain seated.  Tuesday night. Or just order online.

name: Dominique Moore
text: I went to Denny’s the other day and the service was nice and the food was good

name: Jana Gallahar
text: The food was hot and it was not good at all the scrambled eggs were like water i dont know it it was just the cook or what but i know i wont go back for a long while

name: Rily Hughlett
text: I love denny's

name: Joe Johnson
text: There's an old joke that says no one goes to Denny's, they just end up there. This Denny's is NOT the one that joke was based on. It's too far from home for my wife and I to go there just to be going, but we never fail to stop and eat there anytime we have occasion to be south of Montgomery.

name: Philip Branum
text: Stood there a least 10 minutes to be seated and they were not busy, then the person who was suppose to be a waitress was slow and acted like we were bothering her to take my order and then it took 30 minutes to revive our order. We have ate there a few times but I don't know if I will ever go back. I think that they need a supervisor. Very disappointed.

name: Devin Strong
text: This was the worst experience I have ever had any Denny’s restaurant the waitress was rude and slow as can be once she brought my food out it took her a solid 10 minutes to bring me my silverware and then had the nerve to ask me if I wanted her to microwave my food

name: Shanakaw White
text: This has  been the best DENNY’S I has been to yet .  Wonderful service. Great staff . Good food. My server name was Tori she was very sweet. She made us feel very welcome.. I’ll be stopping by again.

name: Conita Henderson
text: Coffee was  warm not hot and the pancakes were barely hot.

name: Working on my 73 K5 Blazer
text: Nice staff, normal Denny's.

name: Quadasha Turner
text: My family and I stopped by this location last week. They have a friendly staff. My service and food was very good thanks to Briana and also thanks to the Manager Chasity.  So if you guys are in the area, stop by. I promise you it’s worth stopping by.

name: Timothy Orr
text: Bacon tots and grilled salmon was delicious. Only about 12 bucks I think. Came with a Caesar salad 👍.

name: daniel Travis
text: They have some awesome spaghetti and meat balls but you gotta ask for extra sauce

name: Lisa Y. Bradberry
text: This turned out to be a great place to eat...at first, we were sceptical but service was great, food was good and we left content.

name: Real Science
text: they've got nice bathrooms

name: delaine padgett
text: The service was wonderful,clean restaurant, helpful and our food was good..thank you to all the staff.they also are doing great at keeping every safe..

name: Chris Cleghorn
text: Not extremely busy but had to wait for seating. Wait to order, 35 minutes to get our food. Food was nothing special. Overcooked. One coffee, one water, no refills. Waited for the check that never came. Went to cinnabon, bathroom, and smoked a cigarette. Went back in and there were 5 employees standing around the register. Paid and left, no tip. Avoid this Denny's. Not worth the time or trouble. Service was horrible.

name: Mammie Reed
text: Service could of been better FOOD WAS GREAT

name: Daniel Bowden
text: Bad. The lady sitting us was not nice. She is really big on covid-19. Don't think she like us being there. She ask us to put our mask on. When the employees had the mask under there noises. 😳.

name: Mary Hubbard
text: The service was terrible.  Food was cold and nasty when we finally got it.  The coffee was ok. Would not waste my time or money.  Worst breakfast I have had in a very time.

name: Sherry Register
text: Our plates looked sloppy.. the eggs were over cooked. Everything even the coffee was cold .

name: Mike Leslie
text: Terrible food. Worst one I have eaten at, and I've eaten at a lot.

name: Heather Jones
text: Took 35 min to get food after ordering in an empty house and food had been sitting out so long by the time we got it it was cold and nasty and we could not even eat half of it BC of how bad it was

name: Christy Reeder
text: Food was eh, there was a long black hair in my omelette and another short one in my daughter's macaroni.  I sent my food back and didn't get an apology or the food taken off the bill.  My husbands over medium eggs had translucent whites still and his chicken fried steak was burnt with old gravy on top.

name: Jon Dreaden
text: World's slowest service,  just like the rest of them.  Great food friendly staff.

name: Sarita Johnson
text: One word AWESOME

name: BK Will
text:
The food was good.( I had my usual for Denny's, the Lumberjack Slam. The service was good.

However, during my breakfast I saw two roaches. Both were on the floor. One near the bar seating. The other one by the cash register, I noticed as I walked to the restrooms.

name: Randy Thornton
text: Pilot is great.

name: Amy Minter
text: We enjoyed the meal. Debra our waitress was very friendly. We will go back.

name: Lisa Davis
text: Waiter came and took order waited almost an hour and no food people coming in after us received there food so we just got up and left

name: Katrina Shepherd
text: Customer service is awful food was worse

name: Jeanette Loftin
text: Simply the breakfast you would want when dining in

name: Calley H
text: Great stop on our way back home, service was awesome.   Food is always consistent.

name: jermay hernandez
text: It sucked won't ever go back
